trans-unit.source: GtkWindowGroup — Limit the effect of grabs

trans-unit.source: GtkWindowGroup objects are referenced by each window in the group, so once you have added all windows to a GtkWindowGroup, you can drop the initial reference to the window group with g_object_unref(). If the windows in the window group are subsequently destroyed, then they will be removed from the window group and drop their references on the window group; when all window have been removed, the window group will be freed.
trans-unit.target: GtkWindowGroup对象由该组中的每个窗口引用，因此，一旦将所有窗口添加到GtkWindowGroup中，就可以使用 g_object_unref() 将初始引用拖放到该窗口组中。如果该窗口组中的窗口随后被销毁，则将它们从该窗口组中删除并将它们的引用放到该窗口组上；当所有窗口都被删除后，该窗口组将被释放。

trans-unit.source: However, GTK provides functionality to make trees look and behave like lists for the people who still want to display lists. This is achieved by using the GtkTreeListModel model to flatten a tree into a list. The GtkTreeExpander widget can then be used inside a listitem to allow users to expand and collapse rows and provide a similar experience to GtkTreeView.
trans-unit.target: 但是，GTK为仍然希望显示列表的人员提供了使树看起来和行为像列表的功能。这是通过使用GtkTreeListModel模型将树展平为列表来实现的。该GtkTreeExpander小部件随后可在列表项内使用，允许用户展开和折叠行和提供类似的体验GtkTreeView。

trans-unit.source: However, in particular for large lists or complex search methods, it is also possible to subclass GtkFilter and provide one's own filter.
trans-unit.target: 但是，特别是对于大型列表或复杂的搜索方法，也可以继承GtkFilter并提供自己的过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Icon themes
trans-unit.target: 图标主题

trans-unit.source: Icons that are directly placed in the resource path instead of a subdirectory are also considered as ultimate fallback, but they are treated like unthemed icons.
trans-unit.target: 直接放置在资源路径中而不是子目录中的图标也被认为是终极回退,但它们被视为未主题图标。

trans-unit.source: Identifies an element (or elements) in order to define a visual, functional, or contextual parent/child relationship between elements where the widget hierarchy cannot be used to represent the relationship. Value type: reference
trans-unit.target: 识别一个(或多个)元素,以定义元素之间的视觉、功能或上下文父/子关系,其中小组件层次结构不能用于表示该关系。值类型:引用

trans-unit.source: Identifies how the user can interact with a particular cell.
trans-unit.target: 识别用户如何与特定单元格互动。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the currently active element when focus is on a composite widget, combobox, textbox, group, or application. Value type: reference
trans-unit.target: 当焦点在复合小组件、组合框、文本框、组或应用程序上时,标识当前活动元素。值类型:引用

trans-unit.source: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object. Value type: reference
trans-unit.target: 识别描述对象的元素(或元素)。价值类型:参考

trans-unit.source: Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element. Value type: reference
trans-unit.target: 识别标记当前元素的元素(或元素)。值类型:参考

trans-unit.source: Identifies the element (or elements) that provide additional information related to the object. Value type: reference
trans-unit.target: 识别提供与对象相关的附加信息的元素。价值类型:参考

trans-unit.source: Identifies the element (or elements) whose contents or presence are controlled by the current element. Value type: reference
trans-unit.target: 标识其内容或存在被当前元素控制的元素(或元素)。值类型:参考

trans-unit.source: Identifies the element that provides an error message for an object. Value type: reference
trans-unit.target: 识别为对象提供错误信息的元素。值类型:参考

trans-unit.source: Identifies the next element (or elements) in an alternate reading order of content which, at the user's discretion, allows assistive technology to override the general default of reading in document source order. Value type: reference
trans-unit.target: 识别内容交替阅读顺序中的下一个(或多个)元素,用户可自行决定是否允许辅助技术覆盖按文档源顺序阅读的一般默认值。值类型:参考

trans-unit.source: If “press” and “long press” are wanted simultaneously, those would need grouping.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时需要“按”和“长按”，则需要分组。

trans-unit.source: If GTK_LICENSE_CUSTOM is used, the current contents of the “license” property are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 GTK_LICENSE_CUSTOM ,则使用“ license”属性的当前内容。

trans-unit.source: If GTK_LICENSE_UNKNOWN is used, the link used will be the same specified in the “website” property.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 GTK_LICENSE_UNKNOWN ,则使用的链接将与“网站”属性中指定的链接相同。

trans-unit.source: If gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget() is not called, then the first activatable ancestor of the GtkLabel will be chosen as the mnemonic widget. For instance, if the label is inside a button or menu item, the button or menu item will automatically become the mnemonic widget and be activated by the mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 如果未调用 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget() ，则GtkLabel的第一个可激活祖先将被选作助记符小部件。例如，如果标签在按钮或菜单项内部，则按钮或菜单项将自动成为助记符小部件并由助记符激活。

trans-unit.source: If “menu-model” is set, the menu model is dissociated from the menu_button , and the property is set to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了“菜单模型”，则菜单模型与 menu_button 分离，并且属性设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If “popover” is already set, it will be dissociated from the menu_button , and the property is set to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经设置了“ popover”，它将与 menu_button 分离，并且该属性设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If “has-origin” is set to TRUE (the default), the scale will highlight the part of the trough between the origin (bottom or left side) and the current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果将“具有原点”设置为 TRUE （默认值），则刻度将突出显示原点（底部或左侧）和当前值之间的谷底部分。

trans-unit.source: If gtk_scrolled_window_set_child() has added a GtkViewport for you, you can remove both your added child widget from the GtkViewport, and the GtkViewport from the GtkScrolledWindow, like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果 gtk_scrolled_window_set_child() 为您添加了GtkViewport，则可以从GtkViewport和GtkScrolledWindow中删除添加的子窗口小部件，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If “underline” is set to PANGO_UNDERLINE_ERROR, an alternate color may be applied instead of the foreground. Setting this property will always override those defaults.
trans-unit.target: 如果将“下划线”设置为 PANGO_UNDERLINE_ERROR ，则可以应用替代颜色而不是前景。设置此属性将始终覆盖这些默认值。

trans-unit.source: If “side” value is GTK_PACK_START , self will display the part before the colon, otherwise after that.
trans-unit.target: 如果“ side”值是 GTK_PACK_START ，则 self 将在冒号之前显示该部分，否则将在冒号之后显示。

trans-unit.source: If FALSE, the GListModel functions for this object return custom GtkTreeListRow objects. If TRUE, the values of the child models are pass through unmodified.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 FALSE ，则此对象的GListModel函数将返回自定义GtkTreeListRow对象。如果为 TRUE ，则子模型的值将未经修改地传递。

trans-unit.source: If FALSE, the window will not display a menubar, regardless of whether the desktop shell is showing it or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 FALSE ，则无论桌面外壳是否显示菜单栏，该窗口都不会显示菜单栏。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, gtk_selection_model_unselect_item() is supported and allows unselecting the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则支持 gtk_selection_model_unselect_item() 并允许取消选择所选项目。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, ratio is ignored, and the aspect ratio is taken from the requistion of the child.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则忽略 ratio ，并且从孩子的要求中获取宽高比。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, font name will be written using font chosen.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则将使用所选字体写入字体名称。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, font name will be written using the selected size.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则将使用选定的大小写字体名称。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, page size combo box and orientation combo box are embedded into page setup page.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则将页面大小组合框和方向组合框嵌入到页面设置页中。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, set the .monospace style class on the text view to indicate that a monospace font is desired.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则在文本视图上设置.monospace样式类，以指示需要等宽字体。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the cell renderer will include an entry and allow to enter values other than the ones in the popup list.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则单元格渲染器将包含一个条目，并允许输入弹出列表中的值以外的其他值。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the print operation will support print of selection. This allows the print dialog to show a "Selection" button.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则打印操作将支持所选内容的打印。这允许打印对话框显示“选择”按钮。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the print operation will try to continue report on the status of the print job in the printer queues and printer. This can allow your application to show things like “out of paper” issues, and when the print job actually reaches the printer. However, this is often implemented using polling, and should not be enabled unless needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则打印操作将尝试继续报告打印机队列和打印机中的打印作业状态。这可以使您的应用程序显示诸如“缺纸”问题之类的信息，以及打印作业实际到达打印机的时间。但是，这通常是使用轮询来实现的，除非需要，否则不应启用它。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the transformation for the cairo context obtained from GtkPrintContext puts the origin at the top left corner of the page (which may not be the top left corner of the sheet, depending on page orientation and the number of pages per sheet). Otherwise, the origin is at the top left corner of the imageable area (i.e. inside the margins).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则从GtkPrintContext获得的cairo上下文的转换会将原点放在页面的左上角（取决于页面的方向和每张纸的页面数，它可能不是页面的左上角）。否则，原点位于可成像区域的左上角（即边距内）。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the values of the child models are passed through in their original state. You then need to call gtk_tree_list_model_get_row() to get the custom GtkTreeListRows.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则子模型的值以其原始状态传递。然后，您需要调用 gtk_tree_list_model_get_row() 以获得自定义GtkTreeListRows。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, unselecting the current item via gtk_selection_model_unselect_item() is supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则支持通过 gtk_selection_model_unselect_item() 取消选择当前项目。

trans-unit.source: If a appears before b in a tree, then -1 is returned. If b appears before a , then 1 is returned. If the two nodes are equal, then 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 a 之前出现 b 在树上，则返回-1。如果 b 在 a 之前出现，则返回1。如果两个节点相等，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: If accelerator_codes is given and the result stored in it is non-NULL, the result must be freed with g_free().
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 accelerator_codes 且存储在其中的结果为非 NULL ，则必须使用 g_free() 释放结果。

trans-unit.source: If activates is TRUE, pressing Enter in the self will activate the default widget for the window containing the self. This usually means that the dialog box containing the self will be closed, since the default widget is usually one of the dialog buttons.
trans-unit.target: 如果 activates 为 TRUE ，则在 self 按Enter键将激活包含自身的窗口的默认小部件。这通常意味着包含自身的对话框将被关闭，因为默认窗口小部件通常是对话框按钮之一。

trans-unit.source: If attributes is NULL, no attributes will be queried, but a list of GFileInfos will still be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果 attributes 为 NULL ，则不会查询任何属性，但仍会创建GFileInfos列表。

trans-unit.source: If auto_render is FALSE the data from previous rendering is kept around and will be used for drawing the widget the next time, unless the window is resized. In order to force a rendering gtk_gl_area_queue_render() must be called. This mode is useful when the scene changes seldom, but takes a long time to redraw.
trans-unit.target: 如果 auto_render 为 FALSE ，则将保留先前渲染的数据，除非下次调整窗口大小，否则下次它将用于绘制窗口小部件。为了强制渲染，必须调用 gtk_gl_area_queue_render() 。当场景很少更改但需要很长时间重绘时，此模式很有用。

trans-unit.source: If auto_render is TRUE the “render” signal will be emitted every time the widget draws. This is the default and is useful if drawing the widget is faster.
trans-unit.target: 如果 auto_render 为 TRUE ，则每次绘制小部件时都会发出“ render”信号。这是默认设置，如果绘制小部件速度更快，则很有用。

trans-unit.source: If autoselect is TRUE, self will enforce that an item is always selected. It will select a new item when the currently selected item is deleted and it will disallow unselecting the current item.
trans-unit.target: 如果 autoselect 为 TRUE ，则 self 将强制始终选择一个项目。当删除当前选择的项目时，它将选择一个新项目，并且将不允许取消选择当前项目。

trans-unit.source: If box was already bound to a model, that previous binding is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 box 已绑定到模型，则先前的绑定将被销毁。

trans-unit.source: If canceled is TRUE, the currently edited cell renderer will emit the ::editing-canceled signal, otherwise the the ::editing-done signal will be emitted on the current edit widget.
trans-unit.target: 如果 canceled 为 TRUE ，则当前编辑的单元格渲染器将发出:: editing-canceled信号，否则将在当前编辑窗口小部件上发出:: editing-done信号。

trans-unit.source: If cascade_popdown is TRUE, the popover will be closed when a child modal popover is closed. If FALSE, popover will stay visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cascade_popdown 为TRUE，则在关闭子模式弹出窗口时将关闭弹出窗口。如果为FALSE，则 popover 将保持可见。

trans-unit.source: If child is at the toplevel, and doesn’t have a parent, then iter is set to an invalid iterator and FALSE is returned. child will remain a valid node after this function has been called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 child 在顶层，并且没有父级，则将 iter 设置为无效的迭代器，并返回 FALSE 。调用此函数后， child 仍将是有效节点。

trans-unit.source: If child is different from the currently visible child, the transition between the two will be animated with the current transition type of stack .
trans-unit.target: 如果 child 与当前可见的child不同，则将使用 stack 的当前过渡类型为两者之间的过渡设置动画。

trans-unit.source: If colors is NULL, removes all previously added palettes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 colors 为 NULL ，则删除所有先前添加的调色板。

trans-unit.source: If column is NULL, the view will be unsorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 column 为 NULL ，则视图将不排序。

trans-unit.source: If column is already a column of self , it will be repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 column 已经是 self 的一列，它将被重新定位。

trans-unit.source: If enable_search is set, then the user can type in text to search through the tree interactively (this is sometimes called "typeahead find").
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 enable_search ，则用户可以键入文本以交互方式搜索树（有时称为“预先查找”）。

trans-unit.source: If file is NULL, the result will be an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 如果 file 为 NULL ，结果将为空列表。

trans-unit.source: If fixed_width is not -1, sets the fixed width of column ; otherwise unsets it.
trans-unit.target: 如果 fixed_width 不为-1，则设置 column 的固定宽度；否则取消设置。

trans-unit.source: If fixed_width is not -1, sets the fixed width of tree_column ; otherwise unsets it. The effective value of fixed_width is clamped between the minimum and maximum width of the column; however, the value stored in the “fixed-width” property is not clamped. If the column sizing is GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_GROW_ONLY or GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_AUTOSIZE, setting a fixed width overrides the automatically calculated width. Note that fixed_width is only a hint to GTK; the width actually allocated to the column may be greater or less than requested.
trans-unit.target: 如果 fixed_width 不为-1，则设置 tree_column 的固定宽度；否则取消设置。的有效值 fixed_width 被最小和列的最大宽度之间夹紧; 但是，存储在“固定宽度”属性中的值不会被钳位。如果列大小为GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_GROW_ONLY或GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_AUTOSIZE，则设置固定宽度会覆盖自动计算的宽度。请注意， fixed_width 仅是GTK的提示。实际分配给该列的宽度可以大于或小于请求的宽度。

trans-unit.source: If focus is not the current focus widget, and is focusable, sets it as the focus widget for the root. If focus is NULL, unsets the focus widget for the root.
trans-unit.target: 如果 focus 不是当前的焦点小部件，并且是可焦点的，则将其设置为根的焦点小部件。如果 focus 为 NULL ，则为根取消设置焦点窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: If focus is not the current focus widget, and is focusable, sets it as the focus widget for the window. If focus is NULL, unsets the focus widget for this window. To set the focus to a particular widget in the toplevel, it is usually more convenient to use gtk_widget_grab_focus() instead of this function.
trans-unit.target: 如果 focus 不是当前的焦点小部件，并且是可焦点的，则将其设置为窗口的焦点小部件。如果 focus 为 NULL ，则取消设置此窗口的焦点窗口小部件。要将焦点设置到顶级中的特定窗口小部件，通常使用 gtk_widget_grab_focus() 代替此函数更方便。

trans-unit.source: If full_page is TRUE, the transformation for the cairo context obtained from GtkPrintContext puts the origin at the top left corner of the page (which may not be the top left corner of the sheet, depending on page orientation and the number of pages per sheet). Otherwise, the origin is at the top left corner of the imageable area (i.e. inside the margins).
trans-unit.target: 如果 full_page 为 TRUE ，则从GtkPrintContext获得的cairo上下文的转换会将原点放在页面的左上角（可能不是页面的左上角，具体取决于页面方向和每张页面的页数） 。否则，原点位于可成像区域的左上角（即边距内）。

trans-unit.source: If func returns TRUE, then the tree ceases to be walked, and gtk_tree_model_foreach() returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果 func 返回 TRUE ，则该树停止走动，并且 gtk_tree_model_foreach() 返回。

trans-unit.source: If gesture is active, this function returns the angle difference in radians since the gesture was first recognized. If gesture is not active, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 gesture 处于活动状态，此功能将返回自首次识别手势以来的弧度角度差。如果 gesture 未激活，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: If gesture is active, this function returns the zooming difference since the gesture was recognized (hence the starting point is considered 1:1). If gesture is not active, 1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 gesture 处于活动状态，则此功能将返回缩放差值，因为已识别出手势（因此起点被认为是1：1）。如果 gesture 未激活，则返回1。

trans-unit.source: If group is NULL, a previously inserted group for name is removed from widget .
trans-unit.target: 如果 group 为 NULL ，则将从 widget 删除先前插入的 name 组。

trans-unit.source: If guide is attached to a GtkConstraintLayout, the constraints will be updated to reflect the new size.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 guide 附加到GtkConstraintLayout，则约束将更新以反映新的大小。

trans-unit.source: If has_depth_buffer is TRUE the widget will allocate and enable a depth buffer for the target framebuffer. Otherwise there will be none.
trans-unit.target: 如果 has_depth_buffer 为 TRUE ,则小部件将为目标帧缓冲区分配并启用深度缓冲区。否则将没有任何结果。

trans-unit.source: If has_stencil_buffer is TRUE the widget will allocate and enable a stencil buffer for the target framebuffer. Otherwise there will be none.
trans-unit.target: 如果 has_stencil_buffer 为 TRUE ,则窗口小部件将分配并启用目标帧缓冲区的模板缓冲区。否则将没有任何结果。

trans-unit.source: If icon is NULL, no icon will be shown in the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 如果 icon 为 NULL ，则在指定位置不会显示任何图标。

trans-unit.source: If icon_name is NULL, no icon will be shown in the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 如果 icon_name 为 NULL ，则在指定位置不会显示任何图标。

trans-unit.source: If internal_child is specified, GtkBuildableIface.get_internal_child() will be automatically implemented by the GtkWidget class so there is no need to implement it manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果 internal_child 指定， GtkBuildableIface.get_internal_child() 会自动被执行的GtkWidget类，所以没有必要手动实现它。

trans-unit.source: If ipp_name is not a recognized paper name, width and height are used to construct a custom GtkPaperSize object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ipp_name 不是可识别的纸张名称，则使用 width 和 height 来构造自定义GtkPaperSize对象。

trans-unit.source: If iter is NULL, the actual cursor position is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 为 NULL ，则使用实际的光标位置。

trans-unit.source: If iter is not valid and gtk_bitset_iter_is_valid() returns FALSE, this function returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 无效，并且 gtk_bitset_iter_is_valid() 返回 FALSE ，则此函数返回0。

trans-unit.source: If line_number is greater than the number of lines in the buffer , the end iterator is returned. And if byte_index is off the end of the line, the iterator at the end of the line is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 line_number 大于 buffer 的行数，则返回结束迭代器。并且如果 byte_index 位于行尾，则返回行尾的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: If line_number is greater than the number of lines in the buffer , the end iterator is returned. And if char_offset is off the end of the line, the iterator at the end of the line is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 line_number 大于 buffer 的行数，则返回结束迭代器。并且如果 char_offset 在行尾不在，则返回行尾的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: If markup is not NULL, text is shown next to the tick mark.
trans-unit.target: 如果 markup 不为 NULL ，则刻度线旁边会显示文本。

trans-unit.source: If match_func is NULL, the filter matches all items.
trans-unit.target: 如果 match_func 为 NULL ，则过滤器将匹配所有项目。

trans-unit.source: If max_columns is smaller than the minimum set via gtk_grid_view_set_min_columns(), that value is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果 max_columns 小于通过 gtk_grid_view_set_min_columns() 设置的最小值，则使用该值。

trans-unit.source: If min_columns is smaller than the minimum set via gtk_grid_view_set_max_columns(), that value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 min_columns 小于通过 gtk_grid_view_set_max_columns() 设置的最小值，则该值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If n_chars is negative, then characters from chars will be inserted until a null-terminator is found. If position or n_chars are out of bounds, or the maximum buffer text length is exceeded, then they are coerced to sane values.
trans-unit.target: 如果 n_chars 为负，则将插入chars中的字符，直到找到空终止符为止。如果 position 或 n_chars 超出范围，或者超过了最大缓冲区文本长度，则将它们强制为合理的值。

trans-unit.source: If name is NULL, the default paper size is returned, see gtk_paper_size_get_default().
trans-unit.target: 如果 name 为 NULL ，则返回默认的纸张尺寸，请参见 gtk_paper_size_get_default() 。

trans-unit.source: If nth is >= the size of self , 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 nth > = self 的大小，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: If paintable is NULL, a default icon is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 paintable 为 NULL ，则使用默认图标。

trans-unit.source: If paintable is NULL, no icon will be shown in the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 如果 paintable 为 NULL ，则在指定位置将不会显示任何图标。

trans-unit.source: If parent has no children, FALSE is returned and iter is set to be invalid. parent will remain a valid node after this function has been called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 parent 没有子级，则返回 FALSE 并将 iter 设置为无效。调用此函数后， parent 将保持有效节点。

trans-unit.source: If parent is NULL returns the first node, equivalent to gtk_tree_model_get_iter_first (tree_model, iter);
trans-unit.target: 如果 parent 为 NULL ,则返回第一个节点，等效于 gtk_tree_model_get_iter_first (tree_model, iter);

trans-unit.source: If parent is already set as the parent widget of widget , this function can also be used to reorder widget in the child widget list of parent .
trans-unit.target: 如果 parent 已被设为父控件 widget ，这个功能也可以用来重新排序 widget 中的子部件列表 parent 。

trans-unit.source: If path is invalid for model , the current cursor (if any) will be unset and the function will return without failing.
trans-unit.target: 如果 path 对于 model 无效，则将不设置当前光标（如果有的话），并且该函数将返回而不会失败。

trans-unit.source: If phase is GTK_PHASE_NONE, no automatic event handling will be performed, but other additional gesture maintenance will. In that phase, the events can be managed by calling gtk_event_controller_handle_event().
trans-unit.target: 如果 phase 为 GTK_PHASE_NONE ，则不会执行自动事件处理，但会执行其他其他手势维护。在该阶段，可以通过调用 gtk_event_controller_handle_event() 来管理事件。

trans-unit.source: If position is -1, or larger than the total number of children in the box , then the widget will be appended to the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果 position 为-1或大于 box 的子项总数，则该 widget 将附加到末尾。

trans-unit.source: If position is -1, or larger than the total number of items in the box , then the child will be appended to the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果 position 为-1或大于 box 的项目总数，则 child 将附加到末尾。

trans-unit.source: If position is greater than the number of children in the root model, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 position 大于根模型中的子 NULL 则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: If position is larger than the number of sorters, nothing happens.
trans-unit.target: 如果 position 大于分拣器的数量，则什么也不会发生。

trans-unit.source: If position is negative then text is appended.
trans-unit.target: 如果 position 为负，则将附加 text 。

trans-unit.source: If position or n_chars are out of bounds, then they are coerced to sane values.
trans-unit.target: 如果 position 或 n_chars 超出范围，那么它们将被强制为合理的值。

trans-unit.source: If ppd_name is not a recognized PPD paper name, ppd_display_name , width and height are used to construct a custom GtkPaperSize object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ppd_name 不是可识别的PPD纸张名称，则使用 ppd_display_name ， width 和 height 构造自定义GtkPaperSize对象。

trans-unit.source: If radio is TRUE, the cell renderer renders a radio toggle (i.e. a toggle in a group of mutually-exclusive toggles). If FALSE, it renders a check toggle (a standalone boolean option). This can be set globally for the cell renderer, or changed just before rendering each cell in the model (for GtkTreeView, you set up a per-row setting using GtkTreeViewColumn to associate model columns with cell renderer properties).
trans-unit.target: 如果 radio 为 TRUE ，则单元格渲染器将渲染单选切换（即一组互斥的切换中的切换）。如果为 FALSE ，它将呈现一个检查切换（独立的布尔选项）。可以为单元格渲染器全局设置此设置，也可以在渲染模型中的每个单元格之前对其进行更改（对于GtkTreeView，您可以使用GtkTreeViewColumn设置每行设置，以将模型列与单元格渲染器属性相关联）。

trans-unit.source: If reorderable is TRUE, then the column can be reordered by the end user dragging the header.
trans-unit.target: 如果 reorderable 为 TRUE ，则最终用户可以拖动标题来对列进行重新排序。

trans-unit.source: If resizable is TRUE, then the user can explicitly resize the column by grabbing the outer edge of the column button. If resizable is TRUE and sizing mode of the column is GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_AUTOSIZE, then the sizing mode is changed to GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_GROW_ONLY.
trans-unit.target: 如果 resizable 为 TRUE ，则用户可以通过抓住列按钮的外边缘来显式调整列的大小。如果resizable为 TRUE 且列的调整大小模式为GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_AUTOSIZE，则调整大小模式将更改为GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_GROW_ONLY。

trans-unit.source: If scope is NULL a new GtkBuilderCScope will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果 scope 为 NULL ,将创建一个新的GtkBuilderCScope。

trans-unit.source: If self 's evaluation fails, target 's property is not updated. You can ensure that this doesn't happen by using a fallback expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果 self 的评估失败，则不会更新 target 的 property 。您可以使用后备表达式确保不会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: If self has not been added to a column view yet, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未将 self 添加到列视图，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If self is a row corresponding to the root model, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 self 是与根模型相对应的行，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If self is not expanded or position is greater than the number of children, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果不扩展 self 或 position 大于子 NULL 则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: If self is set to not be passthrough, this function is equivalent to calling g_list_model_get_item().
trans-unit.target: 如果将 self 设置为不通过，则此函数等效于调用 g_list_model_get_item() 。

trans-unit.source: If sequence is currently being interpreted by gesture , this function returns TRUE and fills in x and y with the last coordinates stored for that event sequence. The coordinates are always relative to the widget allocation.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在使用 gesture 解释 sequence ，则此函数返回 TRUE ，并使用为该事件序列存储的最后一个坐标填充 x 和 y 。坐标始终是相对于小部件分配的。

trans-unit.source: If setting is TRUE, an underscore character in self 's label indicates a mnemonic accelerator key. This behavior is similar to “use-underline”.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setting 为 TRUE ，则 self 的标签中的下划线字符表示助记键。此行为类似于“使用下划线”。

trans-unit.source: If setting is TRUE, pressing Enter in the entry will activate the default widget for the window containing the entry. This usually means that the dialog box containing the entry will be closed, since the default widget is usually one of the dialog buttons.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setting 为 TRUE ，则在 entry 按Enter键将激活包含该条目的窗口的默认小部件。这通常意味着包含条目的对话框将被关闭，因为默认窗口小部件通常是对话框按钮之一。

trans-unit.source: If setting is TRUE, then clicking the close button on the window will not destroy it, but only hide it.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setting 为 TRUE ，则单击窗口上的关闭按钮不会破坏它，而只会将其隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If setting is TRUE, then destroying the transient parent of window will also destroy window itself. This is useful for dialogs that shouldn’t persist beyond the lifetime of the main window they're associated with, for example.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setting 为 TRUE ，那么销毁 window 的瞬时父级也会销毁 window 本身。例如，这对于不应保留在与其关联的主窗口的生存期之外的对话框很有用。

trans-unit.source: If shortcut had not been added to controller or this controller uses an external shortcut list, this function does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未将 shortcut 添加到 controller 或者此控制器使用外部快捷方式列表，则此功能不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If show_progress is TRUE, the print operation will show a progress dialog during the print operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果 show_progress 为 TRUE ，则在打印操作期间，打印操作将显示一个进度对话框。

trans-unit.source: If single is TRUE, children will be activated when you click on them, otherwise you need to double-click.
trans-unit.target: 如果 single 为 TRUE ，则在单击子级时将激活它们，否则需要双击。

trans-unit.source: If single is TRUE, rows will be activated when you click on them, otherwise you need to double-click.
trans-unit.target: 如果 single 为 TRUE ，则在单击行时将激活它们，否则需要双击。

trans-unit.source: If sort_func is NULL, all items are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: 如果 sort_func 为 NULL ，则所有项目均视为相等。

trans-unit.source: If sort_func is NULL, then there will be no default comparison function. This means that once the model has been sorted, it can’t go back to the default state. In this case, when the current sort column id of sortable is GTK_TREE_SORTABLE_DEFAULT_SORT_COLUMN_ID, the model will be unsorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 sort_func 为 NULL ，那么将没有默认的比较功能。这意味着一旦对模型进行了排序，就无法返回到默认状态。在这种情况下，如果当前的排序列编号 sortable 是 GTK_TREE_SORTABLE_DEFAULT_SORT_COLUMN_ID ，该模型将是未排序。

trans-unit.source: If sorter is NULL, the column will not let users change the sorting by clicking on its header.
trans-unit.target: 如果 sorter 为 NULL ，则该列将不允许用户通过单击其标题来更改排序。

trans-unit.source: If string is NULL-terminated, then length should be -1. If length is not -1, then it is the length of string .
trans-unit.target: 如果 string 为 NULL 终止，则 length 应为-1。如果 length 不为-1，则为 string 的长度。

trans-unit.source: If tag_name is NULL, the tag is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tag_name 为 NULL ，则标记为匿名。

trans-unit.source: If tag_name is non-NULL, a tag called tag_name must not already exist in the tag table for this buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tag_name 为非 NULL ，则此缓冲区的标记表中不得已经存在名为 tag_name 的标记。

trans-unit.source: If target_value is NULL then the target value is unset.
trans-unit.target: 如果 target_value 为 NULL ,则未设置目标值。

trans-unit.source: If text contains any markup, it will be escaped.
trans-unit.target: 如果 text 包含任何标记，它将被转义。

trans-unit.source: If text is NULL and “show-text” is TRUE, the current value of “fraction” will be displayed as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 如果 text 为 NULL 且“ show-text”为 TRUE ，则“ fraction”的当前值将以百分比显示。

trans-unit.source: If text is non-NULL and “show-text” is TRUE, the text will be displayed. In this case, it will not display the progress percentage. If text is the empty string, the progress bar will still be styled and sized suitably for containing text, as long as “show-text” is TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 如果 text 为非 NULL 且“ show-text”为 TRUE ，则将显示该文本。在这种情况下，它将不会显示进度百分比。如果 text 是空字符串，则只要“ show-text”为 TRUE ，进度条的样式和大小仍将适合包含文本。

trans-unit.source: If touch_only is TRUE, gesture will only handle events of type GDK_TOUCH_BEGIN, GDK_TOUCH_UPDATE or GDK_TOUCH_END. If FALSE, mouse events will be handled too.
trans-unit.target: 如果 touch_only 为 TRUE ，则 gesture 将仅处理GDK_TOUCH_BEGIN，GDK_TOUCH_UPDATE或GDK_TOUCH_END类型的事件。如果为 FALSE ，则也将处理鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: If use_align is FALSE, then the alignment arguments are ignored, and the tree does the minimum amount of work to scroll the cell onto the screen. This means that the cell will be scrolled to the edge closest to its current position. If the cell is currently visible on the screen, nothing is done.
trans-unit.target: 如果 use_align 为 FALSE ，则将忽略对齐参数，并且树将执行最少的工作量才能将单元格滚动到屏幕上。这意味着该单元格将滚动到最接近其当前位置的边缘。如果当前在屏幕上可见该单元格，则不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If use_align is FALSE, then the alignment arguments are ignored, and the tree does the minimum amount of work to scroll the item onto the screen. This means that the item will be scrolled to the edge closest to its current position. If the item is currently visible on the screen, nothing is done.
trans-unit.target: 如果 use_align 为 FALSE ，则将忽略对齐参数，并且树将进行最少的工作以将项目滚动到屏幕上。这意味着该项目将滚动到最接近其当前位置的边缘。如果当前在屏幕上可见该项目，则不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If use_font is TRUE, the font name will be written using the selected font.
trans-unit.target: 如果 use_font 为 TRUE ，则将使用所选字体写入字体名称。

trans-unit.source: If use_size is TRUE, the font name will be written using the selected size.
trans-unit.target: 如果 use_size 为 TRUE ，则将使用选定的大小写字体名称。

trans-unit.source: If widget is not focusable, or its ::grab_focus implementation cannot transfer the focus to a descendant of widget that is focusable, it will not take focus and FALSE will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 widget 不可聚焦，或者其:: grab_focus实现无法将焦点转移到可聚焦的 widget 的后代，它将不会获得焦点，并且将返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If widget isn't activatable, the function returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果 widget 不可激活，则该函数返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If window belongs to application then this call is equivalent to setting the “application” property of window to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 window 属于 application ,则此调用等效于将 window 的“ application”属性设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If window is given, the session manager may point the user to this window to find out more about why the action is inhibited.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 window ，则会话管理器可以将用户指向该窗口，以查找有关为何禁止该操作的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: If window is hidden, this function calls gtk_widget_show() as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果 window 是隐藏的，则此函数也会调用 gtk_widget_show() 。

trans-unit.source: If NULL is passed as func , the value will be displayed on its own, rounded according to the value of the “digits” property.
trans-unit.target: 如果将NULL作为 func 传递，则该值将单独显示，并根据“ digits”属性的值四舍五入。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, pressing the right mouse button on the notebook pops up a menu that you can use to go to a page.
trans-unit.target: 如果为TRUE,按笔记本上的鼠标右键就会弹出一个菜单,你可以用这个菜单进入一个页面。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, scroll arrows are added if there are too many tabs to fit.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 "true",如果标签太多,会添加滚动箭头。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the columns are all the same width.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 "true",则所有的列都是相同的宽度。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the rows are all the same height.
trans-unit.target: 如果为TRUE,则所有的行都是相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the widget will receive the default action when it is focused.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 "true",小组件在聚焦时将收到默认动作。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the window is modal (other windows are not usable while this one is up).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 "true",则该窗口为模态窗口(当该窗口处于上升状态时,其他窗口无法使用)。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, users can resize the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果为TRUE,用户可以调整窗口大小。

trans-unit.source: If a GtkScrolledWindow doesn’t behave quite as you would like, or doesn’t have exactly the right layout, it’s very possible to set up your own scrolling with GtkScrollbar and for example a GtkGrid.
trans-unit.target: 如果GtkScrolledWindow没有表现得很，你想，或者没有完全正确的布局，它很可能建立自己的滚动与GtkScrollbar和例如GtkGrid。

trans-unit.source: If a context menu is opened, the window node will appear as a subnode of the main node.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开上下文菜单,窗口节点将作为主节点的子节点出现。

trans-unit.source: If a keycode is present in the accelerator and no accelerator_codes is given, the parse will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果加速器中存在键码，但未给出 accelerator_codes ，则解析将失败。

trans-unit.source: If a map is set for this model
trans-unit.target: 如果为该模型设置了地图

trans-unit.source: If a particular action is scoped to a window then it is scoped to a specific window. Another way of saying this: if your application has a “fullscreen” action that applies to windows and it has three windows, then it will have three fullscreen actions: one for each window.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定动作的作用域是某个窗口，则该作用域的作用是特定的窗口。换句话说，如果您的应用程序具有适用于窗口的“全屏”操作，并且具有三个窗口，则它将具有三个全屏操作：每个窗口一个。

trans-unit.source: If a previous function was set, its user_destroy will be called now.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了先前的函数，则将立即调用其 user_destroy 。

trans-unit.source: If a range is flippable, it will switch its direction if it is horizontal and its direction is GTK_TEXT_DIR_RTL.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围是可翻转的，则如果范围是水平的并且方向为 GTK_TEXT_DIR_RTL ，它将切换其方向。

trans-unit.source: If a rectangle to point to has been set, this function will return TRUE and fill in rect with such rectangle, otherwise it will return FALSE and fill in rect with the attached widget coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置要指向的矩形，则此函数将返回 TRUE 并使用该矩形填充 rect ，否则它将返回 FALSE 并使用附加的小部件坐标填充 rect 。

trans-unit.source: If a row has previously been highlighted via gtk_list_box_drag_highlight_row() it will have the highlight removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果先前已通过 gtk_list_box_drag_highlight_row() 突出显示了一行，则该行将被删除。

trans-unit.source: If a row is expandable never changes until the row is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个行是可扩展的,那么在该行被销毁之前永远不会改变。

trans-unit.source: If a row is expanded, the model of calling the GtkTreeListModelCreateModelFunc for the row's item will be inserted after this row. If a row is collapsed, those items will be removed from the model.
trans-unit.target: 如果展开某行，则将在该行之后插入为该行的项目调用GtkTreeListModelCreateModelFunc的模型。如果行被折叠，则这些项目将从模型中删除。

trans-unit.source: If a sequence enters in the GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_CLAIMED state, the gesture group will grab all interaction on the sequence, by:
trans-unit.target: 如果序列进入GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_CLAIMED状态，则手势组将通过以下方式捕获序列上的所有交互：

trans-unit.source: If a sequence enters into the GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_DENIED state, the gesture group will effectively ignore the sequence, letting events go unstopped through the gesture, but the "slot" will still remain occupied while the touch is active.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个序列进入GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_DENIED状态，则手势组将有效地忽略该序列，从而使事件不间断通过该手势，但是在触摸处于活动状态时，“插槽”仍将保持占用状态。

trans-unit.source: If a sort function is set, the widget will actually be inserted at the calculated position.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了排序函数,小组件将实际插入到计算的位置。

trans-unit.source: If a widget does move content around to intelligently use up the allocated size then it must support the request in both GtkSizeRequestModes even if the widget in question only trades sizes in a single orientation.
trans-unit.target: 如果widget确实移动内容以智能地使用分配的大小,那么它必须支持两个GtkSizeRequestModes中的请求,即使有关widget只在单一方向上交换大小。

trans-unit.source: If a widget ends up baseline aligned it will be allocated all the space in the parent as if it was GTK_ALIGN_FILL, but the selected baseline can be found via gtk_widget_get_allocated_baseline(). If this has a value other than -1 you need to align the widget such that the baseline appears at the position.
trans-unit.target: 如果小部件以基线对齐方式结束，则将为其分配父级中的所有空间，就像它是 GTK_ALIGN_FILL 一样，但是可以通过 gtk_widget_get_allocated_baseline() 找到所选的基线。如果该值不是-1，则需要对齐小部件，以使基线出现在该位置。

trans-unit.source: If action widgets are present, their CSS nodes are placed next to the tabs node. If the notebook is scrollable, CSS nodes with name arrow are placed as first and last child of the tabs node.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在操作窗口小部件，则将其CSS节点放置在 tabs 节点旁边。如果笔记本是可滚动的，则将带有名称 arrow CSS节点放置为 tabs 节点的第一个和最后一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: If all rows should be expanded by default
trans-unit.target: 如果所有的行都要默认展开

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs during the loading process, the loading process will finish and this property allows querying the error that happened. This error will persist until a file is loaded again.
trans-unit.target: 如果在加载过程中发生错误,加载过程将结束,该属性允许查询发生的错误。这个错误会一直存在,直到文件被再次加载。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs, 0 will be returned and error will be assigned a GError from the GTK_BUILDER_ERROR, G_MARKUP_ERROR or G_FILE_ERROR domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生错误，将从GTK_BUILDER_ERROR，G_MARKUP_ERROR或G_FILE_ERROR域中将 error 返回0并将错误分配给GError 。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs, 0 will be returned and error will be assigned a GError from the GTK_BUILDER_ERROR, G_MARKUP_ERROR or G_RESOURCE_ERROR domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生错误，将从GTK_BUILDER_ERROR，G_MARKUP_ERROR或G_RESOURCE_ERROR域为 error 返回0并将错误分配给GError 。

trans-unit.source: If an input method is used, the typed text will not immediately be committed to the buffer. So if you are interested in the text, connect to this signal.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用输入法,输入的文本不会立即提交到缓冲区。所以如果你对文本感兴趣,请连接到这个信号。

trans-unit.source: If an item is activatable, double-clicking on the item, using the Return key or calling gtk_widget_activate() will activate the item. Activating instructs the containing view to handle activation. GtkListView for example will be emitting the “activate” signal.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个项目是可激活的，则使用Return键或调用 gtk_widget_activate() 双击该项目将激活该项目。激活指示包含视图进行激活。例如，GtkListView将发出“激活”信号。

trans-unit.source: If any file is still playing, stop playing it.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何文件仍在播放,请停止播放。

trans-unit.source: If any of these features are used the regular GtkFileChooserDialog will be used in place of the native one.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用这些功能中的任何一个，则将使用常规GtkFileChooserDialog代替本机功能。

trans-unit.source: If anything is still playing, stop playing it. Then start playing the given stream .
trans-unit.target: 如果仍在播放，请停止播放。然后开始播放给定的 stream 。

trans-unit.source: If at some point, the height of a single row changes, it should be requested with gtk_cell_area_get_preferred_height() again and then the full height of the requested rows checked again with gtk_cell_area_context_get_preferred_height().
trans-unit.target: 如果在某一点上单行的高度发生了变化，则应再次使用 gtk_cell_area_get_preferred_height() 进行请求，然后再次使用 gtk_cell_area_context_get_preferred_height() 检查所请求的行的全高。

trans-unit.source: If at some point, the width of a single row changes, it should be requested with gtk_cell_area_get_preferred_width() again and then the full width of the requested rows checked again with gtk_cell_area_context_get_preferred_width().
trans-unit.target: 如果在某些点，单排变化的宽度，应与要求 gtk_cell_area_get_preferred_width() 再次，然后请求的行全宽再次检查 gtk_cell_area_context_get_preferred_width() 。

trans-unit.source: If both gestures are in the same group, just set the state on the gesture emitting the event, the sequence will be already be initialized to the group's global state when the second gesture processes the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个手势都在同一个组中,只需在发出事件的手势上设置状态,当第二个手势处理事件时,序列就已经被初始化为该组的全局状态。

trans-unit.source: If both scrollbars are visible, the area where they meet is drawn with a subnode named junction.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个滚动条都是可见的,那么它们相接的区域就会用一个名为junction的子节点来绘制。

trans-unit.source: If called from the start_element or end_element handlers this will give the element_name as passed to those functions. For the parent elements, see gtk_buildable_parse_context_get_element_stack().
trans-unit.target: 如果从start_element或end_element处理程序调用，这将使element_name传递给这些函数。有关父元素，请参见 gtk_buildable_parse_context_get_element_stack() 。

trans-unit.source: If called with more than one argument, the rest of them besides the application name are considered URI locations and are passed as arguments to the launched application.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用时有多个参数,除了应用程序名称外,其余的参数被认为是URI位置,并作为参数传递给启动的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If characters in label are preceded by an underscore, they are underlined. If you need a literal underscore character in a label, use “__” (two underscores). The first underlined character represents a keyboard accelerator called a mnemonic. Pressing Alt and that key activates the button.
trans-unit.target: 如果 label 中的字符前面带有下划线，则会在其下划线。如果在标签中需要文字下划线字符，请使用“ __”（两个下划线）。下划线的第一个字符表示称为助记符的键盘加速器。按下Alt键并激活该按钮。

trans-unit.source: If characters in str are preceded by an underscore, they are underlined. If you need a literal underscore character in a label, use '__' (two underscores). The first underlined character represents a keyboard accelerator called a mnemonic. The mnemonic key can be used to activate another widget, chosen automatically, or explicitly using gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget().
trans-unit.target: 如果 str 中的字符前面带有下划线，则会在它们下划线。如果在标签中需要文字下划线字符，请使用“ __”（两个下划线）。下划线的第一个字符表示称为助记符的键盘加速器。助记键可用于激活自动选择的另一个窗口小部件，或使用 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget() 显式激活。

trans-unit.source: If context creation fails then the signal handler can use gtk_gl_area_set_error() to register a more detailed error of how the construction failed.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文创建失败，则信号处理程序可以使用 gtk_gl_area_set_error() 来注册有关构造失败的更详细的错误。

trans-unit.source: If either tree_x or tree_y are -1, then that direction isn’t scrolled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tree_x 或 tree_y 为-1，则不会滚动该方向。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, changes to editable will be saved for undo/redo actions.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，对 editable 更改将被保存以用于撤消/重做操作。

trans-unit.source: If exact matches are necessary or if substrings are allowed
trans-unit.target: 如果需要完全匹配,或者允许子串,那么就可以进行匹配

trans-unit.source: If hexpand is set, then it overrides any computed expand value based on child widgets. If hexpand is not set, then the expand value depends on whether any children of the widget would like to expand.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 hexpand,那么它将覆盖任何基于子部件的计算扩展值。如果未设置 hexpand,则展开值取决于该小组件的任何子部件是否愿意展开。

trans-unit.source: If instead you want a widget that will not move with the GtkTextView contents see GtkOverlay.
trans-unit.target: 相反，如果您想要一个不会随GtkTextView内容一起移动的小部件，请参阅GtkOverlay。

trans-unit.source: If it is, and the widget becomes a target, you will receive a “drag-enter” signal, followed by “drag-motion” signals as the pointer moves, optionally a “drop” signal when a drop happens, and finally a “drag-leave” signal when the pointer moves off the widget.
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样，并且窗口小部件成为目标，则您将收到“拖动进入”信号，然后在指针移动时收到“拖动运动”信号，或者在发生放下时会收到“放下”信号，最后会收到“指针离开小部件时，“拖动-离开”信号。

trans-unit.source: If key events are handled by the search bar, the bar will be shown, and the entry populated with the entered text.
trans-unit.target: 如果关键事件由搜索栏处理,则会显示该栏,并以输入的文本填充条目。

trans-unit.source: If line wrapping is on (see gtk_label_set_wrap()) this controls how the line wrapping is done. The default is PANGO_WRAP_WORD which means wrap on word boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了换行（请参阅 gtk_label_set_wrap() ），这将控制换行的完成方式。默认值为 PANGO_WRAP_WORD ，这表示自动换行。

trans-unit.source: If line wrapping is on (see the “wrap” property) this controls how the line wrapping is done. The default is PANGO_WRAP_WORD, which means wrap on word boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了自动换行（请参见“ wrap”属性），则可以控制自动换行的方式。默认值为 PANGO_WRAP_WORD ，这意味着在单词边界上换行。

trans-unit.source: If loading fails at any point, the “error” property will be set to give more indication about the failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果加载在任何时候失败，则将设置“错误”属性以提供有关失败的更多指示。

trans-unit.source: If marks are present, there is a marks subnode before or after the trough node, below which each mark gets a node with name mark. The marks nodes get either the .top or .bottom style class.
trans-unit.target: 如果有marks,在槽节点之前或之后有一个marks子节点,每个marks下面得到一个带有name mark的节点。marks节点得到的是.top或.bottom样式类。

trans-unit.source: If matching is case sensitive
trans-unit.target: 如果匹配是区分大小写的

trans-unit.source: If neither GTK_TEXT_SEARCH_VISIBLE_ONLY nor GTK_TEXT_SEARCH_TEXT_ONLY are enabled, the match must be exact; the special 0xFFFC character will match embedded paintables or child widgets.
trans-unit.target: 如果既未启用GTK_TEXT_SEARCH_VISIBLE_ONLY也未启用GTK_TEXT_SEARCH_TEXT_ONLY，则匹配必须准确；特殊的0xFFFC字符将与嵌入的绘画或子小部件匹配。

trans-unit.source: If new media files should be set to loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果新媒体文件应该设置为循环。

trans-unit.source: If no GdkPaintable was used for the icon, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果该图标未使用GdkPaintable，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If no application ID is given then some features (most notably application uniqueness) will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出应用程序ID,那么一些功能(最主要的是应用程序唯一性)将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If no area is specified when creating the cell view with gtk_cell_view_new_with_context() a horizontally oriented GtkCellAreaBox will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用 gtk_cell_view_new_with_context() 创建单元格视图时未指定区域，则将使用水平方向的GtkCellAreaBox。

trans-unit.source: If no area is specified when creating the entry completion with gtk_entry_completion_new_with_area() a horizontally oriented GtkCellAreaBox will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 gtk_entry_completion_new_with_area() 创建条目完成时未指定区域，则将使用水平方向的GtkCellAreaBox。

trans-unit.source: If no area is specified when creating the icon view with gtk_icon_view_new_with_area() a GtkCellAreaBox will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用 gtk_icon_view_new_with_area() 创建图标视图时未指定区域，则将使用GtkCellAreaBox。

trans-unit.source: If no area is specified when creating the tree view column with gtk_tree_view_column_new_with_area() a horizontally oriented GtkCellAreaBox will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用 gtk_tree_view_column_new_with_area() 创建树视图列时未指定区域，则将使用水平方向的GtkCellAreaBox。

trans-unit.source: If no closure could be created, NULL will be returned and error will be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法创建闭包，则将返回 NULL 并设置 error 。

trans-unit.source: If no drag icon exists yet, a new one will be created and shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果还没有拖动图标,将创建一个新的图标并显示出来。

trans-unit.source: If no drop operation is going on, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有进行拖放操作，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If no drop operation is ongoing - when GdkDropTarget:drop returns NULL - this function does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有正在进行的放置操作-当GdkDropTarget：drop返回 NULL 时-此函数不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If no filter operation is ongoing - in particular when “incremental” is FALSE - this function returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有正在进行的过滤器操作-特别是当“ incremental”为 FALSE 时-该函数返回0。

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未选择任何项目，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If no matching icon is found, then a paintable that renders the "missing icon" icon is returned. If you need to do something else for missing icons you need to use gtk_icon_theme_has_icon().
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到匹配的图标，则返回呈现“缺少图标”图标的可绘制对象。如果您需要为丢失的图标做其他事情，则需要使用 gtk_icon_theme_has_icon() 。

trans-unit.source: If no mouse device is present, the scrollbars will overlaid as narrow, auto-hiding indicators over the content. If traditional scrollbars are desired although no mouse is present, this behaviour can be turned off with the “overlay-scrolling” property.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有鼠标设备，则滚动条将作为狭窄的自动隐藏指示器覆盖在内容上。如果尽管没有鼠标也需要传统的滚动条，则可以使用“覆盖滚动”属性关闭此行为。

trans-unit.source: If no sort operation is ongoing - in particular when “incremental” is FALSE - this function returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有正在进行的排序操作（尤其是当“ incremental”为 FALSE 时)，则此函数返回0。

trans-unit.source: If no tags affecting language apply to iter , the return value is identical to that of gtk_get_default_language().
trans-unit.target: 如果没有影响语言的标签应用于 iter ，则返回值与 gtk_get_default_language() 相同。

trans-unit.source: If non-NULL, the application ID must be valid. See g_application_id_is_valid().
trans-unit.target: 如果为非 NULL ，则应用程序ID必须有效。参见 g_application_id_is_valid() 。

trans-unit.source: If not -1, this is the width that the column is allocated, regardless of the size of its content.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是-1,则无论内容的大小,这都是分配给该列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: If nothing requires the Update/Layout/Paint phases we will stay in the Events phase forever, as we don’t want to redraw if nothing changes. Each phase can request further processing in the following phases (e.g. the Update phase will cause there to be layout work, and layout changes cause repaints).
trans-unit.target: 如果什么都不需要更新/布局/绘制阶段，我们将永远停留在“事件”阶段，因为我们不想在没有任何变化的情况下重绘。每个阶段都可以在以下阶段中请求进一步的处理（例如，“更新”阶段将导致进行布局工作，而布局更改将导致重新粉刷）。

trans-unit.source: If one of the projects you’re configuring or building fails, look closely at the error messages printed; these will often provide useful information as to what went wrong. Every build system has its own log that can help you understand the issue you’re encountering. If all else fails, you can ask for help on the GTK forums.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要配置或构建的项目之一失败，请仔细查看打印的错误消息。这些通常会提供有关出了什么问题的有用信息。每个构建系统都有自己的日志，可以帮助您了解所遇到的问题。如果其他所有方法均失败，则可以在GTK论坛上寻求帮助。

trans-unit.source: If set to FALSE or if the contents provide no aspect ratio, the contents will be stretched over the picture's whole area.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 FALSE 或内容不提供纵横比，则内容将在图片的整个区域上拉伸。

trans-unit.source: If set to FALSE the data from previous rendering is kept around and will be used for drawing the widget the next time, unless the window is resized. In order to force a rendering gtk_gl_area_queue_render() must be called. This mode is useful when the scene changes seldom, but takes a long time to redraw.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 FALSE ,则先前渲染的数据将保留，并且下次将用于绘制窗口小部件，除非调整了窗口的大小。为了强制渲染，必须调用 gtk_gl_area_queue_render() 。当场景很少更改但需要很长时间重绘时，此模式很有用。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE the “render” signal will be emitted every time the widget draws. This is the default and is useful if drawing the widget is faster.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则每次绘制小部件时都会发出“渲染”信号。这是默认设置，如果绘制小部件速度更快，则很有用。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE the widget will allocate and enable a depth buffer for the target framebuffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ,则小部件将为目标帧缓冲区分配并启用深度缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE the widget will allocate and enable a stencil buffer for the target framebuffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ,则小部件将为目标帧缓冲区分配并启用模板缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE the widget will try to create a GdkGLContext using OpenGL ES instead of OpenGL.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ,则小部件将尝试使用OpenGL ES而不是OpenGL创建GdkGLContext。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, the self can be made smaller than its contents. The contents will then be scaled down when rendering.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则可以使其 self 小于其内容。渲染时，内容将按比例缩小。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, the self will render its contents according to their aspect ratio. That means that empty space may show up at the top/bottom or left/right of self .
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则 self 将根据其纵横比渲染其内容。这意味着，空的空间可以在顶部/底部显示向上或向左/右 self 。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, the model will recursively expand all rows that get added to the model. This can be either rows added by changes to the underlying models or via gtk_tree_list_row_set_expanded().
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则模型将递归扩展所有添加到模型中的行。这可以是通过对基础模型的更改而添加的行，也可以是通过 gtk_tree_list_row_set_expanded() 添加的行。

trans-unit.source: If set, GDK makes all X requests synchronously. This is a useful option for debugging, but it will slow down the performance considerably.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了,GDK会同步处理所有X请求。这对于调试来说是个很有用的选项,但会大大降低性能。

trans-unit.source: If set, GTK uses $GTK_DATA_PREFIX instead of the prefix configured when GTK was compiled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则GTK使用 $GTK_DATA_PREFIX 而不是在编译GTK时配置的前缀。

trans-unit.source: If set, GTK uses $GTK_EXE_PREFIX/lib instead of the libdir configured when GTK was compiled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，GTK将使用 $GTK_EXE_PREFIX/lib 而不是在编译GTK时配置的libdir。

trans-unit.source: If set, an underline in the text indicates the next character should be used for the mnemonic accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,文本中的下划线表示下一个字符应该用于记忆加速键。

trans-unit.source: If set, an underline in the title indicates the next character should be used for the mnemonic accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,标题中的下划线表示下一个字符应该用于记忆加速键。

trans-unit.source: If set, makes GTK use the named theme instead of the theme that is specified by the gtk-theme-name setting. This is intended mainly for easy debugging of theme issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则使GTK使用命名的主题而不是gtk-theme-name设置所指定的主题。这主要是为了方便调试主题问题。

trans-unit.source: If set, selects the GDK backend to use. Selecting a backend requires that GTK is compiled with support for that backend. The following backends can be selected, provided they are included in the GDK libraries you are using:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,选择要使用的GDK后端。选择一个后端需要GTK编译时支持该后端。可以选择以下后端,前提是你使用的GDK库中包含了这些后端。

trans-unit.source: If set, selects the GSK renderer to use. The following renderers can be selected, provided they are included in the GTK library you are using and the GDK backend supports them:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,选择要使用的GSK渲染器。可以选择以下渲染器,前提是你所使用的GTK库中包含了这些渲染器,并且GDK后端支持它们。

trans-unit.source: If set, selects the accessibility backend to use. The following backends can be selected, provided they are included in the GTK library you are using:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,选择要使用的可访问性后端。可以选择以下后端,前提是你使用的GTK库中包含了这些后端。

trans-unit.source: If set, this function is called before any node is selected or unselected, giving some control over which nodes are selected. The select function should return TRUE if the state of the node may be toggled, and FALSE if the state of the node should be left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此功能，则在选择或未选择任何节点之前将调用此函数，从而可以控制选择哪些节点。如果可以切换节点的状态，那么select函数应该返回 TRUE ,如果应该保持节点的状态不变，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If set, wrap lines if the text becomes too wide.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了,如果文字变得太宽,就会进行包线。

trans-unit.source: If some state changes so you need to redraw some area of your widget you use the normal gtk_widget_queue_draw() set of functions. These will request a Paint phase and mark the region as needing redraw.
trans-unit.target: 如果某些状态发生变化，那么您需要重绘窗口小部件的某些区域，则可以使用常规的 gtk_widget_queue_draw() 函数集。这些将请求“绘制”阶段，并将该区域标记为需要重绘。

trans-unit.source: If some state changes that causes the size of your widget to change you call gtk_widget_queue_resize() which will request a Layout phase and mark your widget as needing relayout.
trans-unit.target: 如果某些状态更改导致窗口小部件的大小发生更改，则调用 gtk_widget_queue_resize() ，这将请求Layout阶段并将您的窗口小部件标记为需要重新布局。

trans-unit.source: If supporting alternative cell areas with your derived widget is not important, then this does not have to concern you. If you want to support alternative cell areas, you can do so by moving the problematic calls out of init() and into a constructor() for your class.
trans-unit.target: 如果用派生的小部件支持替代单元格区域并不重要，那么您不必担心。如果要支持其他单元格区域，可以通过将有问题的调用移出 init() 并移至类的 constructor() 来实现。

trans-unit.source: If text is overwritten when typing in the GtkEntry.
trans-unit.target: 如果在键入GtkEntry时文本被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If text is overwritten when typing in the GtkText.
trans-unit.target: 如果在键入GtkText时文本被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If the GtkAccessibleRelation requires a list of references, you should pass each reference individually, followed by NULL, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 如果GtkAccessibleRelation需要引用列表，则应分别传递每个引用，后跟 NULL ，例如

trans-unit.source: If the “show-all” property is TRUE, the app chooser presents all applications in a single list, without subsections for default, recommended or related applications.
trans-unit.target: 如果“ show-all”属性为 TRUE ，则应用程序选择器将所有应用程序显示在一个列表中，而没有默认，推荐或相关应用程序的小节。

trans-unit.source: If the “mode” is GTK_CELL_RENDERER_MODE_EDITABLE, the GtkCellRendererText allows to edit its text using an entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果“模式”为 GTK_CELL_RENDERER_MODE_EDITABLE ，则GtkCellRendererText允许使用条目来编辑其文本。

trans-unit.source: If the “id-column” property of combo_box is not set, or if no row is active, or if the active row has a NULL ID value, then NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 combo_box 的“ id-column”属性，或者没有行处于活动状态，或者活动行具有 NULL ID值，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the “id-column” property of combo_box is unset or if no row has the given ID then the function does nothing and returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 combo_box 的“ id-column”属性，或者没有行具有给定的ID，则该函数不执行任何操作并返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the “source” property is set to NULL, the constraint will use the GtkConstraintLayout's widget.
trans-unit.target: 如果将“ source”属性设置为 NULL ，则 constraint 将使用GtkConstraintLayout的小部件。

trans-unit.source: If the “target” property is set to NULL, the constraint will use the GtkConstraintLayout's widget.
trans-unit.target: 如果“ target”属性设置为 NULL ，则 constraint 将使用GtkConstraintLayout的小部件。

trans-unit.source: If the GtkPicture can be made smaller than the self it contains.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以使GtkPicture小于它所包含的自身。

trans-unit.source: If the “draw-value” property is FALSE, the return values are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果“ draw-value”属性为 FALSE ，则返回值是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: If the “strikethrough-rgba” property has been set.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置“ strikethrough-rgba”属性。

trans-unit.source: If the “underline-rgba” property has been set.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置“ underline-rgba”属性。

trans-unit.source: If the cursor is NULL, widget will use the cursor inherited from the parent widget.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cursor 为NULL，则 widget 将使用从父小部件继承的游标。

trans-unit.source: If the gesture is active, this function returns TRUE and fills in x and y with the coordinates of the current point, as an offset to the starting drag point.

trans-unit.source: If the GtkComboBoxText contains an entry (via the “has-entry” property), its contents can be retrieved using gtk_combo_box_text_get_active_text(). The entry itself can be accessed by calling gtk_bin_get_child() on the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 如果GtkComboBoxText包含一个条目（通过“ has-entry”属性），则可以使用 gtk_combo_box_text_get_active_text() 检索其内容。可以通过在组合框上调用 gtk_bin_get_child() 来访问条目本身。

trans-unit.target: 如果可用的 icon_name 不可用并且提供了 fallbacks ，则将按顺序尝试它们。

trans-unit.source: If the check button is in an “in between” state.
trans-unit.target: 如果检查按钮处于“介于”状态。

trans-unit.source: If the command line contains any escape characters defined inside the storage specification, they will be expanded.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令行中包含任何在存储规范中定义的转义字符,它们将被展开。

trans-unit.source: If the condition calculated by the function changes over time (e.g. because it depends on some global parameters), you must call gtk_tree_model_filter_refilter() to keep the visibility information of the model up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: 如果函数计算的条件随时间变化（例如，因为它取决于某些全局参数），则必须调用 gtk_tree_model_filter_refilter() 来保持模型的可见性信息为最新。

trans-unit.source: If the context was not allocated in width or height, or if the context was recently reset with gtk_cell_area_context_reset(), the returned value will be -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果未按宽度或高度分配上下文，或者如果最近使用 gtk_cell_area_context_reset() 重置了上下文，则返回值为-1。

trans-unit.source: If the current contents are longer than the given length, then they will be truncated to fit.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的内容比给定的长度长,那么它们将被截断以适应。

trans-unit.target: 如果当前值在此范围之外,则会调整到适合范围内,否则将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: If the data references a resource, gets the path of that resource.

trans-unit.source: If the decision whether the drop will be accepted or rejected needs further processing, such as inspecting the data, this function should return TRUE and proceed as is drop was accepted and if it decides to reject the drop later, it should call gtk_drop_target_async_reject_drop().
trans-unit.target: 如果决定接受还是拒绝放置的决定需要进一步处理，例如检查数据，则此函数应返回 TRUE 并继续接受 drop ，如果决定以后拒绝放置，则应调用 gtk_drop_target_async_reject_drop() 。

trans-unit.source: If the decision whether the drop will be accepted or rejected needs inspecting the data, this function should return TRUE, the GtkDropTarget:preload property should be set and the value should be inspected via the GObject::notify:value signal and then call gtk_drop_target_reject().
trans-unit.target: 如果决定是接受还是拒绝投递的决定需要检查数据，则此函数应返回 TRUE ，应设置GtkDropTarget：preload属性，并应通过GObject :: notify：value信号检查该值，然后调用 gtk_drop_target_reject() 。

trans-unit.source: If the desktop environment does not display the menubar, then GtkApplicationWindow will automatically show a menubar for it. This behaviour can be overridden with the “show-menubar” property. If the desktop environment does not display the application menu, then it will automatically be included in the menubar or in the windows client-side decorations.
trans-unit.target: 如果桌面环境未显示菜单栏，则GtkApplicationWindow将自动显示其菜单栏。可以使用“ show-menubar”属性覆盖此行为。如果桌面环境未显示应用程序菜单，则它将自动包含在菜单栏中或Windows客户端装饰中。

trans-unit.source: If the dialog is not visible this does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果对话框不可见,这就没有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: If the does not fit in the available space in the given direction, GTK will its best to keep it inside the screen and fully visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的方向上不适合可用空间,GTK会尽最大努力让它在屏幕内完全可见。

trans-unit.source: If the drop is not accepted, FALSE will be returned and the drop target will ignore the drop. If TRUE is returned, the drop is accepted for now but may be rejected later via a call to gtk_drop_target_async_reject() or ultimately by returning FALSE from “drop”.
trans-unit.target: 如果不接受放置，则将返回 FALSE ，放置目标将忽略放置。如果返回 TRUE ，则 gtk_drop_target_async_reject() 接受该放置，但稍后可以通过调用gtk_drop_target_async_reject（）或最终从“ drop”返回 FALSE 来拒绝该放置。

trans-unit.source: If the drop target should support more than 1 type, pass G_TYPE_INVALID for type and then call gtk_drop_target_set_gtypes().
trans-unit.target: 如果放置目标应支持不止一种类型，请传递 G_TYPE_INVALID 作为 type ，然后调用 gtk_drop_target_set_gtypes() 。

trans-unit.source: If the element at iter is a paintable, the paintable is returned (with no new reference count added). Otherwise, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 处的元素是可绘制的，则返回可绘制的（不添加新的引用计数）。否则，返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the entry is not realized or has no icon at the given position, icon_area is filled with zeros. Otherwise, icon_area will be filled with the icon's allocation, relative to entry 's allocation.
trans-unit.target: 如果该条目未实现或在给定位置没有图标，则 icon_area 填充为零。否则， icon_area 将填充图标的分配（相对于 entry 的分配）。

trans-unit.target: 如果该条目是GtkSearchBar的一部分，则最好调用 gtk_search_bar_set_key_capture_widget() ，它不仅会触发搜索条目，还会显示该条目。

trans-unit.source: If the file chooser is in folder mode, this function returns the selected folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件选择器处于文件夹模式,该函数将返回所选文件夹。

trans-unit.source: If the file isn’t loaded successfully, the image will contain a “broken image” icon similar to that used in many web browsers. If you want to handle errors in loading the file yourself, for example by displaying an error message, then load the image with gdk_texture_new_from_file(), then create the GtkImage with gtk_image_new_from_paintable().
trans-unit.target: 如果文件未成功加载，则该图像将包含一个“残破的图像”图标，类似于许多Web浏览器中使用的图标。如果你想在通过显示错误消息加载自己的文件，例如处理错误，然后加载与图像 gdk_texture_new_from_file() ，然后创建GtkImage与 gtk_image_new_from_paintable() 。

trans-unit.source: If the file isn’t loaded successfully, the picture will contain a “broken image” icon similar to that used in many web browsers. If you want to handle errors in loading the file yourself, for example by displaying an error message, then load the image with gdk_texture_new_from_file(), then create the GtkPicture with gtk_picture_new_for_paintable().
trans-unit.target: 如果文件未成功加载，则图片中将包含一个“残破的图像”图标，类似于许多网络浏览器中使用的图标。如果你想在通过显示错误消息加载自己的文件，例如处理错误，然后加载与图像 gdk_texture_new_from_file() ，然后创建GtkPicture与 gtk_picture_new_for_paintable() 。

trans-unit.source: If the file name isn’t in the current folder of chooser , then the current folder of chooser will be changed to the folder containing filename .
trans-unit.target: 如果文件名是不是在当前文件夹 chooser ，那么当前文件夹 chooser 将改为包含文件夹 filename 。

trans-unit.source: If the filter func changes its filtering behavior, gtk_filter_changed() needs to be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果过滤器功能更改了其过滤行为， gtk_filter_changed() 需要调用gtk_filter_changed（）。

trans-unit.source: If the frame’s label widget is a GtkLabel, returns the text in the label widget. (The frame will have a GtkLabel for the label widget if a non-NULL argument was passed to gtk_frame_new().)
trans-unit.target: 如果框架的标签小部件是GtkLabel，则返回标签小部件中的文本。（如果将非 NULL 参数传递给 gtk_frame_new() ,则该框架将具有用于标签小部件的GtkLabel。）

trans-unit.target: 如果该手势具有 GTK_PHASE_NONE ， GDK_TOUCHPAD_SWIPE GDK_TOUCHPAD_PINCH 处理确保类型为GDK_TOUCHPAD_SWIPE和GDK_TOUCHPAD_PINCH的事件

trans-unit.source: If the label has a selection, it gets a subnode with name selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签有选择,它就会得到一个带有名称选择的子节点。

trans-unit.source: If the label has been set so that it has a mnemonic key (using i.e. gtk_label_set_markup_with_mnemonic(), gtk_label_set_text_with_mnemonic(), gtk_label_new_with_mnemonic() or the “use_underline” property) the label can be associated with a widget that is the target of the mnemonic. When the label is inside a widget (like a GtkButton or a GtkNotebook tab) it is automatically associated with the correct widget, but sometimes (i.e. when the target is a GtkEntry next to the label) you need to set it explicitly using this function.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置标签以使其具有助记键（使用 gtk_label_set_markup_with_mnemonic() ， gtk_label_set_text_with_mnemonic() ， gtk_label_new_with_mnemonic() 或“ use_underline”属性），则该标签可以与作为的目标的小部件相关联。当标签位于小部件内（如GtkButton或GtkNotebook选项卡）时，它会自动与正确的小部件相关联，但是有时（即，当目标是标签旁边的GtkEntry时），您需要使用此函数显式设置它。

trans-unit.source: If the label has been set so that it has a mnemonic key this function returns the keyval used for the mnemonic accelerator. If there is no mnemonic set up it returns GDK_KEY_VoidSymbol.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签的设置使其有一个记忆键,则该函数返回用于记忆加速器的键值。如果没有设置记号键,则返回GDK_KEY_VoidSymbol。

trans-unit.source: If the label has links, there is one subnode per link. These subnodes carry the link or visited state depending on whether they have been visited. In this case, label node also gets a .link style class.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签有链接,每个链接有一个子节点。这些子节点根据是否被访问,携带链接或被访问状态。在这种情况下,标签节点也会得到一个.link样式的类。

trans-unit.source: If the limit is set to GTK_LIMIT_SAME_NATIVE, the controller won't handle events that are targeted at widgets on a different surface, such as popovers.
trans-unit.target: 如果限制设置为 GTK_LIMIT_SAME_NATIVE ，则控制器将不会处理针对不同表面上的小部件的事件，例如弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: If the list does not have an item at position or GTK_INVALID_LIST_POSITION is given, the behavior depends on the value of the “autoselect” property: If it is set, no change will occur and the old item will stay selected. If it is unset, the selection will be unset and no item will be selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表中没有 position 项目，或者给出了GTK_INVALID_LIST_POSITION，则行为取决于“ autoselect”属性的值：如果设置了该属性，则不会进行任何更改，并且旧项目将保持选中状态。如果未设置，则所选内容将被取消设置，并且不会选择任何项目。

trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 的位置包含子锚，则返回该锚（不添加新的引用计数）。否则，返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.target: 如果操作成功，则返回 TRUE 。如果 widget 没有边界，或者边界不能在 target 的坐标空间中表示（例如，如果两个窗口小部件都在不同的窗口中），则返回 FALSE 并将 bounds 设置为零矩形。

trans-unit.target: 如果解析失败，则会将 accelerator_key ， accelerator_mods 和 accelerator_codes 设置为0（零）。

trans-unit.source: If the parse fails, accelerator_key and accelerator_mods will be set to 0 (zero).

trans-unit.source: If the picture cannot be described textually, set this property to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法用文字描述图片，请将此属性设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.target: 如果属性是布尔值,动作将没有参数,并切换属性值。否则,动作将有一个与属性相同类型的参数。

trans-unit.target: 如果引用是最后一个引用，则释放与 self 相关的资源。

trans-unit.target: 如果渲染器不支持GL着色器，或者在编译着色器时出现任何问题，则该节点将绘制粉红色。您应该使用 gsk_gl_shader_compile() 来确保 shader 器在使用渲染器之前可以使用。

trans-unit.source: If the result is NULL, all formats are expected to be supported.

trans-unit.target: 如果生成的对象符合 this_type ，则将查询其名为 property_name 的属性。否则，此表达式的求值将失败。

trans-unit.source: If the row is expanded, gets the model holding the children of self .
trans-unit.target: 如果行被扩展，则得到持有 self 的子代的模型。

trans-unit.target: 如果比例尺具有原点（请参阅 gtk_scale_set_has_origin() ），则在槽节点下有一个名称为高亮的子节点，用于渲染该槽的高亮部分。

trans-unit.source: If the scale is displaying the value (see “draw-value”), there is subnode with name value. This node will get the .top or .bottom style classes similar to the marks node.
trans-unit.target: 如果比例尺正在显示值（请参见“绘制值”），则存在具有名称值的子节点。该节点将获得与标记节点类似的.top或.bottom样式类。

trans-unit.source: If the search column is set, users can use the “start-interactive-search” key binding to bring up search popup. The enable-search property controls whether simply typing text will also start an interactive search.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了搜索列，则用户可以使用“ start-interactive-search”键绑定来弹出搜索弹出窗口。enable-search属性控制是否仅键入文本也将启动交互式搜索。

trans-unit.target: 如果选择将始终选择一个项目

trans-unit.source: If the shader requires textures (see gsk_gl_shader_get_n_textures()), then it is expected that you call gtk_snapshot_gl_shader_pop_texture() the number of times that are required. Each of these calls will generate a node that is added as a child to the gl shader node, which in turn will render these offscreen and pass as a texture to the shader.
trans-unit.target: 如果着色器需要纹理（请参见 gsk_gl_shader_get_n_textures() ），则可以期望您将 gtk_snapshot_gl_shader_pop_texture() 调用所需的次数。这些调用中的每一个都会生成一个节点，该节点作为子节点添加到gl shader节点，而后者又将这些渲染渲染到屏幕外，并作为纹理传递给着色器。

trans-unit.source: If the size request in a given direction is -1 (unset), then the “natural” size request of the widget will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定方向上的尺寸请求为-1（未设置），则将使用小部件的“自然”尺寸请求。

trans-unit.source: If the sort func changes its sorting behavior, gtk_sorter_changed() needs to be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果sort func更改了其排序行为， gtk_sorter_changed() 需要调用gtk_sorter_changed（）。

trans-unit.source: If the status of the button changes, this action causes the “toggled” signal to be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果按钮的状态发生变化，此操作将导致发出“切换”信号。

trans-unit.source: If the stream has no audio or is muted, calling this function will still work but it will not have an immediate audible effect. When the stream is unmuted, the new volume setting will take effect.

trans-unit.source: If the string contains Pango XML markup, you will have to set the “use-markup” property to TRUE in order for the label to display the markup attributes. trans-unit.target: 如果字符串包含Pango XML标记，则必须将“ use-markup”属性设置为 TRUE ，以便标签显示标记属性。另请参见 gtk_label_set_markup() 以获取便利功能，该便利功能可同时设置此属性和“ use-markup”属性。

trans-unit.source: If the string contains underlines acting as mnemonics, you will have to set the “use-underline” property to TRUE in order for the label to display them.

trans-unit.source: If the user has selected a range of elements (such as some text or spreadsheet cells) that are affected by a check button, and the current values in that range are inconsistent, you may want to display the toggle in an "in between" state. Normally you would turn off the inconsistent state again if the user checks the check button. This has to be done manually, gtk_check_button_set_inconsistent only affects visual appearance, not the semantics of the button.

trans-unit.source: If the user has the permission and cannot drop it, the button is hidden.

trans-unit.source: If the value of this setting is TRUE, clicking the primary button in a GtkRange trough will move the slider, and hence set the range’s value, to the point that you clicked. If it is FALSE, a primary click will cause the slider/value to move by the range’s page-size towards the point clicked.

trans-unit.source: If there are touch sequences being currently handled by gesture , this function returns TRUE and fills in rect with the bounding box containing all active touches. Otherwise, FALSE will be returned.

trans-unit.source: If there is a resource located at "gtk/help-overlay.ui" which defines a GtkShortcutsWindow with ID "help_overlay" then GtkApplication associates an instance of this shortcuts window with each GtkApplicationWindow and sets up the keyboard accelerator Control-? to open it. To create a menu item that displays the shortcuts window, associate the item with the action win.show-help-overlay.

trans-unit.source: If there is an error locating the resource or parsing the description, then the program will be aborted.

trans-unit.source: If there is an error opening the file or parsing the description then the program will be aborted. You should only ever attempt to parse user interface descriptions that are shipped as part of your program.

trans-unit.target: 如果这一行可以扩展

trans-unit.source: If track_status is TRUE, the print job will try to continue report on the status of the print job in the printer queues and printer. This can allow your application to show things like “out of paper” issues, and when the print job actually reaches the printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果track_status为 TRUE ，则打印作业将尝试继续报告打印机队列和打印机中该打印作业的状态。这可以使您的应用程序显示诸如“缺纸”问题之类的信息，以及打印作业实际到达打印机的时间。

trans-unit.source: If track_status is TRUE, the print operation will try to continue report on the status of the print job in the printer queues and printer. This can allow your application to show things like “out of paper” issues, and when the print job actually reaches the printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果track_status为 TRUE ，则打印操作将尝试继续报告打印机队列和打印机中打印作业的状态。这可以使您的应用程序显示诸如“缺纸”问题之类的信息，以及打印作业实际到达打印机的时间。

trans-unit.source: If true, a standard close button is shown. When clicked it emits the response GTK_RESPONSE_CLOSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则显示标准关闭按钮。单击 GTK_RESPONSE_CLOSE 发出响应GTK_RESPONSE_CLOSE。

trans-unit.source: If true, an underline in the text indicates the next character should be used for the mnemonic accelerator key.

trans-unit.source: If what you are drawing does change, call gtk_widget_queue_draw() on the drawing area. This will cause a redraw and will call draw_func again.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要绘制的内容确实发生更改，请在绘图区域上调用 gtk_widget_queue_draw() 。这将导致重 draw_func 并再次调用draw_func。

trans-unit.source: If you add buttons to GtkDialog using gtk_dialog_new_with_buttons(), gtk_dialog_add_button(), gtk_dialog_add_buttons(), or gtk_dialog_add_action_widget(), clicking the button will emit a signal called “response” with a response ID that you specified. GTK will never assign a meaning to positive response IDs; these are entirely user-defined. But for convenience, you can use the response IDs in the GtkResponseType enumeration (these all have values less than zero). If a dialog receives a delete event, the “response” signal will be emitted with a response ID of GTK_RESPONSE_DELETE_EVENT.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 gtk_dialog_new_with_buttons() ， gtk_dialog_add_button() ， gtk_dialog_add_buttons() 或 gtk_dialog_add_action_widget() 将按钮添加到GtkDialog，则单击该按钮将发出一个带有您指定的响应ID的信号“ response”。 GTK永远不会为肯定的响应ID分配含义；这些完全是用户定义的。但是为了方便起见，您可以在GtkResponseType枚举中使用响应ID （这些ID的值均小于零）。如果对话框接收到删除事件，则将发出“响应”信号，其响应ID为GTK_RESPONSE_DELETE_EVENT。

trans-unit.source: If you are adding an object that depends on an object that is not its child (for instance a GtkTreeView that depends on its GtkTreeModel), you have to explicitly list all of them in object_ids .
trans-unit.target: 如果要添加依赖于不是其子对象的对象的对象（例如，依赖于其GtkTreeModel的GtkTreeView），则必须在 object_ids 中显式列出所有对象。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a library with custom GtkWidgets that render differently than standard components, you may need to add a GtkStyleProvider yourself with the GTK_STYLE_PROVIDER_PRIORITY_FALLBACK priority, either a GtkCssProvider or a custom object implementing the GtkStyleProvider interface. This way themes may still attempt to style your UI elements in a different way if needed so.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在开发定制库GtkWidgets用于呈现不同于标准组件，您可能需要添加一个GtkStyleProvider自己与 GTK_STYLE_PROVIDER_PRIORITY_FALLBACK 优先级，无论是GtkCssProvider或实现自定义对象GtkStyleProvider接口。这样，如果需要，主题仍然可以尝试使用其他方式来设置UI元素的样式。

trans-unit.source: If you are doing an animation, you can use gtk_widget_add_tick_callback() which will cause a regular beating of the clock with a callback in the Update phase until you stop the tick.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在制作动画，则可以使用 gtk_widget_add_tick_callback() ，这将导致在Update阶段中定期用跳动敲打时钟，直到停止滴答为止。
