trans-unit.source: If you are implementing your own GtkWidget derived type, you will need to set the GtkAccessible properties yourself, and provide an implementation of the GtkAccessible virtual functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果要实现自己的GtkWidget派生类型，则需要自己设置GtkAccessible属性，并提供GtkAccessible虚拟函数的实现。

trans-unit.source: If you are looking to add icons or progress display in an entry, look at GtkEntry. There other alternatives for more specialized use cases, such as GtkSearchEntry.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在条目中添加图标或进度显示，请查看GtkEntry。对于更专业的用例，还有其他替代方法，例如GtkSearchEntry。

trans-unit.source: If you are setting a string-valued target and want to set the action name at the same time, you can use gtk_actionable_set_detailed_action_name().
trans-unit.target: 如果要设置字符串值目标并希望同时设置操作名称，则可以使用 gtk_actionable_set_detailed_action_name() 。

trans-unit.source: If you are using GtkApplication, you don't have to call gtk_init() or gtk_init_check(); the “startup” handler does it for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是GtkApplication，则不必调用 gtk_init() 或 gtk_init_check() ；“启动”处理程序将为您完成此任务。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a GtkStyleContext returned from gtk_widget_get_style_context(), you do not need to call this yourself.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是从 gtk_widget_get_style_context() 返回的GtkStyleContext，则无需自己调用它。

trans-unit.source: If you are using custom styling on an applications, you probably want then to make your style information prevail to the theme’s, so you must use a GtkStyleProvider with the GTK_STYLE_PROVIDER_PRIORITY_APPLICATION priority, keep in mind that the user settings in XDG_CONFIG_HOME/gtk-4.0/gtk.css will still take precedence over your changes, as it uses the GTK_STYLE_PROVIDER_PRIORITY_USER priority.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在使用的应用的定制造型，你可能想，然后让你的样式信息为准，以主题的，所以你必须使用一个GtkStyleProvider与 GTK_STYLE_PROVIDER_PRIORITY_APPLICATION 优先级，请记住，在用户设置 XDG_CONFIG_HOME/gtk-4.0/gtk.css 仍将优先于您的更改，因为它使用 GTK_STYLE_PROVIDER_PRIORITY_USER 优先级。

trans-unit.source: If you are writing an implementation and are not sure which value to pass, GTK_FILTER_CHANGE_DIFFERENT is always a correct choice.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在编写实现，并且不确定要传递哪个值，则 GTK_FILTER_CHANGE_DIFFERENT 始终是正确的选择。

trans-unit.source: If you call gtk_print_operation_set_allow_async() or set the “allow-async” property the operation will run asynchronously if this is supported on the platform. The “done” signal will be emitted with the result of the operation when the it is done (i.e. when the dialog is canceled, or when the print succeeds or fails).
trans-unit.target: 如果您调用 gtk_print_operation_set_allow_async() 或设置“ allow-async”属性，则该操作将在平台上支持异步运行。所述“完成”信号将与当它完成的操作的结果被发射（即，当对话被取消，或当打印成功或失败）。

trans-unit.source: If you call gtk_native_dialog_hide() before the user responds to the dialog this signal will not be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在用户响应对话框之前调用 gtk_native_dialog_hide() ，则不会发出该信号。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want expander arrow to appear in your tree, set the expander column to a hidden column.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不想让扩张器箭头出现在树上,请将扩张器列设置为隐藏列。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t have permission to write to the directory you are installing in, you may have to change to root temporarily before running ninja install.
trans-unit.target: 如果您无权写入要安装的目录，则可能必须在运行 ninja install 之前临时更改为root 。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t set a job name, GTK picks a default one by numbering successive print jobs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未设置作业名称，则GTK会通过对连续的打印作业编号来选择默认作业。

trans-unit.source: If you don't need to do pagination in chunks, you can simply do it all in the ::begin-print handler, and set the number of pages from there.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不需要分块进行分页,你可以简单地在::begin-print处理程序中进行,并从那里设置页数。

trans-unit.source: If you don't set a job name, GTK picks a default one by numbering successive print jobs.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不设置作业名,GTK会通过给连续的打印作业编号来选择一个默认的名称。

trans-unit.source: If you enabled print status tracking then gtk_print_operation_is_finished() may still return FALSE after “done” was emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了打印状态跟踪，则 gtk_print_operation_is_finished() 在发出“完成”后仍可能返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If you have a case that doesn’t quite fit in GtkAssistants way of handling buttons, you can use the GTK_ASSISTANT_PAGE_CUSTOM page type and handle buttons yourself.
trans-unit.target: 如果您遇到的情况不太适合GtkAssistants处理按钮的方式，则可以使用GTK_ASSISTANT_PAGE_CUSTOM页面类型并自己处理按钮。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a direct GtkWidget subclass that supports height-for-width or width-for-height geometry management for itself or its child widgets, the GtkWidgetClass.get_request_mode() virtual function must be implemented as well and return the widget's preferred request mode. The default implementation of this virtual function returns GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_CONSTANT_SIZE, which means that the widget will only ever get -1 passed as the for_size value to its GtkWidgetClass.measure() implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您实现直接的GtkWidget子类为其本身或其子窗口小部件支持高宽或高宽几何管理，则还必须实现 GtkWidgetClass.get_request_mode() 虚拟函数，并返回小部件的首选请求模式。该虚拟函数的默认实现返回 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_CONSTANT_SIZE ，这意味着该窗口小部件将永远只通过for_size值-1传递到其 GtkWidgetClass.measure() 实现。

trans-unit.source: If you keep a PangoLayout created in this way around, you need to re-create it when the widget PangoContext is replaced. This can be tracked by listening to changes of the “root” property on the widget.
trans-unit.target: 如果你保持一个PangoLayout围绕这种方式创建，你需要将窗口小部件时重新创建PangoContext被替换。可以通过侦听小部件上“ root”属性的更改来跟踪此情况。

trans-unit.source: If you need multi-line editable text, look at GtkTextView.

trans-unit.source: If you need multiple columns with headers, see GtkColumnView.

trans-unit.source: If you only plan to have simple (text-only) tooltips on full items, you can use this function to have GtkIconView handle these automatically for you. column should be set to the column in icon_view ’s model containing the tooltip texts, or -1 to disable this feature.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅计划对完整项目使用简单的（纯文本）工具提示，则可以使用此功能让GtkIconView为您自动处理这些提示。应该将 column 设置为 icon_view 模型中包含工具提示文本的列，或者将-1设置为禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: If you only plan to have simple (text-only) tooltips on full rows, you can use this function to have GtkTreeView handle these automatically for you. column should be set to the column in tree_view ’s model containing the tooltip texts, or -1 to disable this feature.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅计划在整行上使用简单的（纯文本）工具提示，则可以使用此功能让GtkTreeView为您自动处理这些提示。应该将 column 设置为 tree_view 的模型中包含工具提示文本的列，或者将-1设置为禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: If you set a custom titlebar, GTK will do its best to convince the window manager not to put its own titlebar on the window. Depending on the system, this function may not work for a window that is already visible, so you set the titlebar before calling gtk_widget_show().
trans-unit.target: 如果设置自定义标题栏，GTK将尽力说服窗口管理器不要在窗口上放置其自己的标题栏。根据系统的不同，此功能可能不适用于已经可见的窗口，因此您可以在调用 gtk_widget_show() 之前设置标题栏。

trans-unit.source: If you set the label contents using the “label” property you should also ensure that you set the “use-markup” property accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用“ label”属性设置标签内容，则还应确保相应地设置“ use-markup”属性。

trans-unit.source: If you unset the widget tooltip via gtk_widget_set_tooltip_text() or gtk_widget_set_tooltip_markup(), this sets GtkWidget:has-tooltip to FALSE, which suppresses icon tooltips too. You can resolve this by then calling gtk_widget_set_has_tooltip() to set GtkWidget:has-tooltip back to TRUE, or setting at least one non-empty tooltip on any icon achieves the same result.
trans-unit.target: 如果您通过 gtk_widget_set_tooltip_text() 或 gtk_widget_set_tooltip_markup() 取消设置窗口小部件工具提示，则会将GtkWidget：has-tooltip设置为 FALSE ，这也会抑制图标工具提示。您可以通过调用 gtk_widget_set_has_tooltip() 将GtkWidget：has-tooltip设置回 TRUE 来解决此问题，或者在任何图标上设置至少一个非空工具提示以达到相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: If you use this function to reestablish a previously saved window size, note that the appropriate size to save is the one returned by gtk_window_get_default_size(). Using the window allocation directly will not work in all circumstances and can lead to growing or shrinking windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此功能重新建立以前保存的窗口大小，请注意，要保存的适当大小是 gtk_window_get_default_size() 返回的大小。直接使用窗口分配并非在所有情况下都有效，并且可能导致窗口增大或缩小。

trans-unit.source: If you want a notebook to accept drags from other widgets, you will have to set your own DnD code to do it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想让笔记本接受来自其他widget的拖拽,你必须设置自己的DnD代码来实现。

trans-unit.source: If you want a widget to interact with a notebook through DnD (i.e.: accept dragged tabs from it) it must be set as a drop destination and accept the target “GTK_NOTEBOOK_TAB”. The notebook will fill the selection with a GtkWidget** pointing to the child widget that corresponds to the dropped tab.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望小部件通过DnD与笔记本进行交互（即：接受其拖动的选项卡），则必须将其设置为放置目标并接受目标“ GTK_NOTEBOOK_TAB”。笔记本将用一个GtkWidget **填充所选内容，该GtkWidget **指向与所放置的选项卡相对应的子窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: If you want all children to be assigned the same size, you can use the “homogeneous” property.
trans-unit.target: 如果要为所有子项分配相同的大小，则可以使用“同质”属性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to be notified when the user activates a row (by key or not), use the “row-activated” signal on the row’s parent GtkListBox.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在用户激活行（无论是否通过键）时收到通知，请在行的父GtkListBox上使用“行激活”信号。

trans-unit.source: If you want to display a file, consider using gtk_video_set_file() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果要显示文件，请考虑改用 gtk_video_set_file() 。

trans-unit.target: 如果你想估算进度,你可以使用这样的代码。

trans-unit.source: If you want to insert several actions at the same time, it is typically faster and easier to use GActionEntry.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想同时插入几个动作,通常使用GActionEntry更快、更方便。

trans-unit.source: If you want to integrate well with the platform you should use the GtkFileChooserNative API, which will use a platform-specific dialog if available and fall back to GtkFileChooserDialog otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果要与平台很好地集成，则应使用GtkFileChooserNative API，该API将使用特定于平台的对话框（如果可用），否则将退回到GtkFileChooserDialog。

trans-unit.source: If you want to iterate through the list and perform actions involving callbacks that might destroy the widgets or add new ones, be aware that the list of toplevels will change and emit the "items-changed" signal.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想在列表中进行迭代,并执行涉及回调的操作,这些操作可能会破坏widgets或添加新的widgets,请注意toplevels列表会发生变化,并发出 "items-changed "信号。

trans-unit.source: If you want to keep a reference to object , use gtk_constant_expression_new().
trans-unit.target: 如果要保留对 object 的引用，请使用 gtk_constant_expression_new() 。

trans-unit.source: If you want to place the cursor in response to a user action, be sure to use gtk_text_buffer_place_cursor(), which moves both at once without causing a temporary selection (moving one then the other temporarily selects the range in between the old and new positions).
trans-unit.target: 如果要响应用户操作放置光标，请确保使用 gtk_text_buffer_place_cursor() ，该控件一次移动两个而不引起临时选择（先移动一个，然后另一个临时选择新旧位置之间的范围） 。

trans-unit.source: If you want to preselect a particular existing file, you should use gtk_file_chooser_set_file() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果要预选特定的现有文件，则应改用 gtk_file_chooser_set_file() 。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set up keyboard accelerators for widgets, GtkShortcutTrigger is probably more convenient than the functions in this section.
trans-unit.target: 如果要为小部件设置键盘加速器，则GtkShortcutTrigger可能比本节中的功能更方便。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the amount of space placed between each child, you can use the “spacing” property.
trans-unit.target: 如果要指定每个孩子之间放置的空间量，则可以使用“ spacing”属性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to still force a minimum size manually, consider using gtk_widget_set_size_request().
trans-unit.target: 如果仍要手动强制最小大小，请考虑使用 gtk_widget_set_size_request() 。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use pre-existing textures as input to the shader rather than rendering new ones, use gtk_snapshot_append_texture() to push a texture node. These will be used directly rather than being re-rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用预先存在的纹理作为着色器的输入而不是渲染新纹理，请使用 gtk_snapshot_append_texture() 推送纹理节点。这些将直接使用，而不是重新呈现。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to handle the activation keybinding yourself, it is recommended to use gtk_widget_class_add_shortcut() with an action created with gtk_signal_action_new().
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望自己处理激活键绑定，建议将 gtk_widget_class_add_shortcut() 与 gtk_signal_action_new() 创建的动作一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this if the buildable needs to parse content below <child>. To handle an element, the implementation must fill in the parser and user_data and return TRUE. GtkWidget implements this to parse accessible attributes specified in <accessibility> elements. Note that user_data must be freed in custom_tag_end or custom_finished .
trans-unit.target: 如果可构建项需要解析<child>下的内容，请实施此方法。要处理元素，实现必须填写 parser 和 user_data 并返回 TRUE 。GtkWidget实现此功能以解析在<accessibility>元素中指定的可访问属性。请注意，必须在 custom_tag_end 或 custom_finished 中释放 user_data 。

trans-unit.target: Implementations

trans-unit.source: Implementations are expected to show alpha by rendering the color over a non-uniform background (like a checkerboard pattern).
trans-unit.target: 通过在非均匀的背景上渲染颜色(如棋盘图案),实现有望显示alpha。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of GtkCellEditable are responsible for emitting this signal when they are done editing, e.g. GtkEntry emits this signal when the user presses Enter. Typical things to do in a handler for ::editing-done are to capture the edited value, disconnect the cell_editable from signals on the GtkCellRenderer, etc.
trans-unit.target: GtkCellEditable的实现负责在完成编辑后发出此信号，例如GtkEntry在用户按下Enter时发出此信号。在:: editing-done处理程序中，典型的操作是捕获编辑后的值，将 cell_editable 与GtkCellRenderer上的信号断开连接，等等。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of GtkCellEditable are responsible for emitting this signal when they are done editing. It must be emitted after the “editing-done” signal, to give the cell renderer a chance to update the cell's value before the widget is removed.
trans-unit.target: GtkCellEditable的实现负责在完成编辑后发出此信号。它必须在“ editing-done”（编辑完成）信号之后发出，以使单元格渲染器有机会在删除小部件之前更新单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of GtkCellLayout which also implement the GtkBuildable interface (GtkCellView, GtkIconView, GtkComboBox, GtkEntryCompletion, GtkTreeViewColumn) accept GtkCellRenderer objects as <child> elements in UI definitions. They support a custom <attributes> element for their children, which can contain multiple <attribute> elements. Each <attribute> element has a name attribute which specifies a property of the cell renderer; the content of the element is the attribute value.
trans-unit.target: GtkCellLayout的实现还实现了GtkBuildable接口（GtkCellView，GtkIconView，GtkComboBox，GtkEntryCompletion，GtkTreeViewColumn），将GtkCellRenderer对象作为UI定义中的<child>元素。他们为其子级提供一个自定义的<attributes>元素，其中可以包含多个<attribute>元素。每个<attribute>元素都有一个name属性，该属性指定单元格渲染器的属性。元素的内容是属性值。

trans-unit.source: Implementing the search needs quite a few code changes that we are not going to completely go over here. The central piece of the search implementation is a signal handler that listens for text changes in the search entry.
trans-unit.target: 实现搜索需要相当多的代码变化,我们在这里不打算完全赘述。搜索实现的核心部分是一个信号处理程序,它可以监听搜索条目中的文本变化。

trans-unit.source: In GTK, actions are typically scoped to either an application or a window, but any widget can have actions associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 在GTK中,动作通常被限定在一个应用程序或一个窗口中,但任何widget都可以有与之相关的动作.

trans-unit.source: In GTK, the main widgets that implement this interface are GtkColorChooserWidget, GtkColorChooserDialog and GtkColorButton.
trans-unit.target: 在GTK中，实现此接口的主要窗口小部件是GtkColorChooserWidget，GtkColorChooserDialog和GtkColorButton。

trans-unit.source: In a GTK application, the purpose of the main() function is to create a GtkApplication object and run it. In this example a GtkApplication pointer named app is declared and then initialized using gtk_application_new().
trans-unit.target: 在GTK应用程序中， main() 函数的目的是创建一个GtkApplication对象并运行它。在此示例中，声明了一个名为 app 的GtkApplication指针，然后使用 gtk_application_new() 对其进行了初始化。

trans-unit.source: In addition if an icon found isn’t found either in the current icon theme or the default icon theme, and an image file with the right name is found directly in one of the elements of path , then that image will be used for the icon name. (This is legacy feature, and new icons should be put into the fallback icon theme, which is called hicolor, rather than directly on the icon path.)
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果在当前图标主题或默认图标主题中都找不到找到的图标，并且直接在 path 的元素之一中找到具有正确名称的图像文件，则该图像将用于该图标姓名。（这是旧功能，应将新图标放入后备图标主题中，该主题称为hicolor，而不是直接在图标路径上。）

trans-unit.source: In addition to the normal options provided by Meson, GTK defines various arguments that modify what should be built. All of these options are passed to meson as -Doption=value. Most of the time, the value can be true or false, or enabled, disabled or auto.
trans-unit.target: 除了Meson提供的常规选项外，GTK还定义了各种参数来修改应构建的内容。所有这些选项都作为 -Doption=value 传递给 meson 。在大多数情况下，该值可以为 true 或 false ，也可以为 enabled ， disabled 或 auto 。

trans-unit.source: In addition, GtkFixed does not pay attention to text direction and thus may produce unwanted results if your app is run under right-to-left languages such as Hebrew or Arabic. That is: normally GTK will order containers appropriately for the text direction, e.g. to put labels to the right of the thing they label when using an RTL language, but it can’t do that with GtkFixed. So if you need to reorder widgets depending on the text direction, you would need to manually detect it and adjust child positions accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 另外，GtkFixed不注意文本方向，因此如果您的应用程序使用从右到左的语言（例如希伯来语或阿拉伯语）运行，则可能会产生不想要的结果。也就是说：GTK通常会根据文本方向对容器进行适当排序，例如，在使用RTL语言时，将标签放置在它们所标记的事物的右侧，但是GtkFixed不能做到这一点。因此，如果需要根据文本方向对小部件进行重新排序，则需要手动检测它并相应地调整子位置。

trans-unit.source: In addition, GtkFixedLayout does not pay attention to text direction and thus may produce unwanted results if your app is run under right-to-left languages such as Hebrew or Arabic. That is: normally GTK will order containers appropriately depending on the text direction, e.g. to put labels to the right of the thing they label when using an RTL language; GtkFixedLayout won't be able to do that for you.
trans-unit.target: 此外，GtkFixedLayout不注意文本方向，因此如果您的应用程序使用从右到左的语言（例如希伯来语或阿拉伯语）运行，则可能会产生不需要的结果。即：通常，GTK将根据文本方向适当地对容器进行排序，例如，在使用RTL语言时，将标签放置在它们所标记的事物的右侧；GtkFixedLayout将无法为您执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: In addition, certain files will be read when GTK is initialized. First, the file $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/gtk-4.0/gtk.css is loaded if it exists. Then, GTK loads the first existing file among XDG_DATA_HOME/themes/THEME/gtk-VERSION/gtk-VARIANT.css, $HOME/.themes/THEME/gtk-VERSION/gtk-VARIANT.css, $XDG_DATA_DIRS/themes/THEME/gtk-VERSION/gtk-VARIANT.css and DATADIR/share/themes/THEME/gtk-VERSION/gtk-VARIANT.css, where THEME is the name of the current theme (see the “gtk-theme-name” setting), VARIANT is the variant to load (see the “gtk-application-prefer-dark-theme” setting), DATADIR is the prefix configured when GTK was compiled (unless overridden by the GTK_DATA_PREFIX environment variable), and VERSION is the GTK version number. If no file is found for the current version, GTK tries older versions all the way back to 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 另外，初始化GTK时将读取某些文件。首先，如果文件 $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/gtk-4.0/gtk.css 存在，则将其加载。然后，GTK加载 XDG_DATA_HOME/themes/THEME/gtk-VERSION/gtk-VARIANT.css ， $HOME/.themes/THEME/gtk-VERSION/gtk-VARIANT.css ， $XDG_DATA_DIRS/themes/THEME/gtk-VERSION/gtk-VARIANT.css 和 DATADIR/share/themes/THEME/gtk-VERSION/gtk-VARIANT.css ，其中 THEME 是当前主题的名称（请参阅“ gtk-theme-name”设置）， VARIANT是要加载的变体（请参见“ gtk-application-prefer-dark-theme”设置）， DATADIR 是在编译GTK时配置的前缀（除非被 GTK_DATA_PREFIX 环境变量覆盖），而 VERSION 是GTK的版本号。如果找不到当前版本的文件，则GTK会一直尝试使用较早的版本直至4.0。

trans-unit.source: In case there are no actions for a given accelerator, an empty array is returned. NULL is never returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有针对给定加速器的操作，则返回一个空数组。永远不会返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to gtk_print_run_page_setup_dialog(), this function returns after showing the page setup dialog on platforms that support this, and calls done_cb from a signal handler for the ::response signal of the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_print_run_page_setup_dialog() 相比，此函数在显示支持此功能的平台上显示页面设置对话框后返回，并从信号处理程序中为对话框的:: response信号调用 done_cb 。

trans-unit.source: In detail, the size requested for each widget in a GtkSizeGroup is the maximum of the sizes that would have been requested for each widget in the size group if they were not in the size group. The mode of the size group (see gtk_size_group_set_mode()) determines whether this applies to the horizontal size, the vertical size, or both sizes.
trans-unit.target: 详细地，为GtkSizeGroup中的每个窗口小部件请求的大小是如果不在大小组中的大小组中的每个窗口小部件所请求的最大大小。大小组的模式（请参阅 gtk_size_group_set_mode() ）确定这是否适用于水平大小，垂直大小或同时适用于这两种大小。

trans-unit.source: In general, you should only create display specific resources when a widget has been realized, and you should free those resources when the widget is unrealized.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,您应该只在小组件已经实现时创建显示特定资源,而在小组件未实现时,您应该释放这些资源。

trans-unit.source: In horizontal orientation, the nodes are always arranged from left to right, regardless of text direction.
trans-unit.target: 在水平方向上,无论文本方向如何,节点总是从左到右排列。

trans-unit.source: In horizontal orientation, the nodes are arranged based on the text direction, so in left-to-right mode, :first-child will select the leftmost child, while it will select the rightmost child in RTL layouts.
trans-unit.target: 在水平方向上,节点是根据文字方向排列的,所以在从左到右的模式下,:first-child会选择最左边的孩子,而在RTL布局中,它会选择最右边的孩子。

trans-unit.source: In many cases it’s also convenient to first create the buffer with gtk_text_buffer_new(), then create a widget for that buffer with gtk_text_view_new_with_buffer(). Or you can change the buffer the widget displays after the widget is created with gtk_text_view_set_buffer().
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，首先使用 gtk_text_buffer_new() 创建缓冲区，然后使用 gtk_text_view_new_with_buffer() 为该缓冲区创建小部件也很方便。或者，您可以使用 gtk_text_view_set_buffer() 创建窗口小部件后更改窗口小部件显示的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: In many cases, named themes are used indirectly, via GtkImage rather than directly, but looking up icons directly is also simple. The GtkIconTheme object acts as a database of all the icons in the current theme. You can create new GtkIconTheme objects, but it’s much more efficient to use the standard icon theme of the GtkWidget so that the icon information is shared with other people looking up icons.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，通过GtkImage间接使用命名主题，而不是直接使用，但是直接查找图标也很简单。该GtkIconTheme对象作为在当前主题中的所有图标的数据库。您可以创建新的GtkIconTheme对象，但是使用GtkWidget的标准图标主题效率更高，以便与其他查找图标的人共享图标信息。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, gtk_window_set_default_size() is a better choice for toplevel windows than this function; setting the default size will still allow users to shrink the window. Setting the size request will force them to leave the window at least as large as the size request. When dealing with window sizes, gtk_window_set_geometry_hints() can be a useful function as well.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，对于此顶级窗口， gtk_window_set_default_size() 是比该函数更好的选择。设置默认大小仍将允许用户缩小窗口。设置大小请求将迫使他们离开窗口至少与大小请求一样大。在处理窗口大小时， gtk_window_set_geometry_hints() 也可能是有用的函数。

trans-unit.source: In order to build GTK, you will need meson installed on your system. On Linux, and other UNIX-like operating systems, you will also need ninja. This guide does not cover how to install these two requirements, but you can refer to the Meson website for more information. The Ninja build tool is also usable on various operating systems, so we will refer to it in the examples.
trans-unit.target: 为了构建GTK，您将需要在系统上安装介子。在Linux和其他类似UNIX的操作系统上，您还将需要ninja。本指南未涵盖如何安装这两个要求，但是您可以参考Meson网站以获取更多信息。在忍者构建工具也是在各种操作系统上使用，所以我们将把它的例子。

trans-unit.source: In order to build GTK, you will need meson installed on your system. On Linux, and other UNIX-like operating systems, you will also need ninja. This guide does not cover how to install these two requirements, but you can refer to the Meson website for more information. The Ninja build tool is also usable on various operating systems, so we will refer to it in the examples.
trans-unit.target: 为了构建GTK，您将需要在系统上安装介子。在Linux和其他类似UNIX的操作系统上，您还将需要ninja。本指南未涵盖如何安装这两个要求，但是您可以参考Meson网站以获取更多信息。在忍者构建工具也是在各种操作系统上使用，所以我们将把它的例子。

trans-unit.source: In order to construct the final style information, GtkStyleContext queries information from all attached GtkStyleProviders. Style providers can be either attached explicitly to the context through gtk_style_context_add_provider(), or to the display through gtk_style_context_add_provider_for_display(). The resulting style is a combination of all providers’ information in priority order.
trans-unit.target: 为了构造最终的样式信息，GtkStyleContext从所有附加的GtkStyleProviders中查询信息。样式提供程序可以通过 gtk_style_context_add_provider() 显式附加到上下文，也可以通过 gtk_style_context_add_provider_for_display() 附加到显示。生成的样式是按优先级顺序排列的所有提供者信息的组合。

trans-unit.source: In order to draw, you have to connect to the “render” signal, or subclass GtkGLArea and override the GtkGLAreaClass.render() virtual function.
trans-unit.target: 为了进行绘制，您必须连接到“ render”信号或子类GtkGLArea并重写 GtkGLAreaClass.render() 虚拟函数。

trans-unit.source: In order to make life simpler for programmers who do not need to write their own specialized model, two generic models are provided — the GtkTreeStore and the GtkListStore. To use these, the developer simply pushes data into these models as necessary. These models provide the data structure as well as all appropriate tree interfaces. As a result, implementing drag and drop, sorting, and storing data is trivial. For the vast majority of trees and lists, these two models are sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 为了使不需要编写自己的专用模型的程序员的工作变得更简单，提供了两个通用模型-GtkTreeStore和GtkListStore。要使用它们，开发人员只需根据需要将数据推送到这些模型中。这些模型提供了数据结构以及所有适当的树接口。结果，实现拖放，排序和存储数据是微不足道的。对于绝大多数树和列表，这两个模型就足够了。

trans-unit.source: In order to print something with GtkPrintUnixDialog, you need to use gtk_print_unix_dialog_get_selected_printer() to obtain a GtkPrinter object and use it to construct a GtkPrintJob using gtk_print_job_new().
trans-unit.target: 为了使用GtkPrintUnixDialog打印某些内容，您需要使用 gtk_print_unix_dialog_get_selected_printer() 获得一个GtkPrinter对象，并使用它来使用 gtk_print_job_new() 构造一个GtkPrintJob。

trans-unit.target: 为了接收事件，手势需要通过 gtk_event_controller_set_propagation_phase() 设置传播阶段。

trans-unit.source: In order to register the new recently used resource, metadata about the resource must be passed as well as the URI; the metadata is stored in a GtkRecentData, which must contain the MIME type of the resource pointed by the URI; the name of the application that is registering the item, and a command line to be used when launching the item.
trans-unit.target: 为了注册最近使用的新资源，必须传递有关该资源的元数据以及URI。元数据存储在GtkRecentData中，该数据必须包含URI指向的资源的MIME类型；注册该项目的应用程序的名称，以及启动该项目时要使用的命令行。

trans-unit.source: In order to use a GtkStackSidebar, you simply use a GtkStack to organize your UI flow, and add the sidebar to your sidebar area. You can use gtk_stack_sidebar_set_stack() to connect the GtkStackSidebar to the GtkStack.
trans-unit.target: 为了使用GtkStackSidebar，您只需使用GtkStack来组织UI流程，并将侧栏添加到侧栏区域。您可以使用 gtk_stack_sidebar_set_stack() 将GtkStackSidebar连接到GtkStack。

trans-unit.source: In order to use this function, you should first call gtk_im_context_get_surrounding() to get the current context, and call this function immediately afterwards to make sure that you know what you are deleting. You should also account for the fact that even if the signal was handled, the input context might not have deleted all the characters that were requested to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 为了使用此函数，您应该首先调用 gtk_im_context_get_surrounding() 来获取当前上下文，然后立即调用此函数以确保您知道要删除的内容。您还应该考虑以下事实：即使处理了信号，输入上下文也可能没有删除所有要求删除的字符。

trans-unit.source: In some cases the layouting widget is requested the height for an arbitrary for_width, this is a special case for layouting widgets who need to request size for tens of thousands of rows. For this case it’s only important that the layouting widget calculate one reasonably sized chunk of rows and return that height synchronously. The reasoning here is that any layouting widget is at least capable of synchronously calculating enough height to fill the screen height (or scrolled window height) in response to a single call to GtkWidgetClass.measure(). Returning a perfect height for width that is larger than the screen area is inconsequential since after the layouting receives an allocation from a scrolled window it simply continues to drive the scrollbar values while more and more height is required for the row heights that are calculated in the background.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，要求布局小部件的高度为任意for_width，这对于需要请求成千上万行大小的布局小部件来说是一种特殊情况。对于这种情况，布局小部件计算一个合理大小的行并同步返回该高度非常重要。这里的理由是，任何布局小部件都至少能够响应一次对 GtkWidgetClass.measure() 的调用而同步计算足够的高度以填充屏幕高度（或滚动的窗口高度）。。对于大于屏幕区域的宽度返回理想高度是无关紧要的，因为在布局从滚动窗口接收到分配之后，它仅继续驱动滚动条值，而在背景。

trans-unit.source: In some situations, it may be inappropriate to give users access to the GTK inspector. The keyboard shortcuts can be disabled with the enable-inspector-keybinding key in the org.gtk.Settings.Debug GSettings schema.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，授予用户访问GTK检查器的权限可能是不合适的。可以使用 org.gtk.Settings.Debug GSettings模式中的 enable-inspector-keybinding 键禁用键盘快捷键。

trans-unit.target: 在（不常见的）情况下，您希望将来自多个源的用户界面描述添加到同一GtkBuilder中，您可以调用 gtk_builder_new() 以获取一个空的构建器，并通过（多次）调用 gtk_builder_add_from_file() ， gtk_builder_add_from_resource() 或 gtk_builder_add_from_string() 。

trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，Foo小部件必须确保已经计算了一些行大小（Foo判断为适合在单个超时迭代中请求空间的行数），然后才通过以下方式简单地返回该区域所需的空间量：该GtkCellAreaContext。

trans-unit.source: In the absence of these sharing mechanisms, GTK reads default values for settings from settings.ini files in /etc/gtk-4.0, $XDG_CONFIG_DIRS/gtk-4.0 and $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/gtk-4.0. These files must be valid key files (see GKeyFile), and have a section called Settings. Themes can also provide default values for settings by installing a settings.ini file next to their gtk.css file.
trans-unit.target: 在没有这些共享机制，GTK读取从设置的默认值 settings.ini 文件中 /etc/gtk-4.0 ， $XDG_CONFIG_DIRS/gtk-4.0 和 $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/gtk-4.0 。这些文件必须是有效的密钥文件（请参阅GKeyFile），并且具有名为“设置”的部分。主题还可以通过在 gtk.css 文件旁边安装 settings.ini 文件来提供设置的默认值。

trans-unit.source: In the bubble phase, events are propagated up from the target widget to the toplevel, and gestures that are attached to containers above the widget get a chance to interact with events that have not been handled yet.
trans-unit.target: 在气泡阶段,事件从目标widget向上传播到toplevel,附着在widget上方容器上的手势有机会与尚未处理的事件进行交互。

trans-unit.source: In the capture phase, events are propagated from the toplevel down to the target widget, and gestures that are attached to containers above the widget get a chance to interact with the event before it reaches the target.
trans-unit.target: 在捕捉阶段,事件从toplevel向下传播到目标widget,附着在widget上方容器上的手势在到达目标之前就有机会与事件交互。

trans-unit.source: In the case of continuous scroll events, GtkEventControllerScroll encloses all “scroll” events between two “scroll-begin” and “scroll-end” signals.
trans-unit.target: 在连续滚动事件的情况下，GtkEventControllerScroll将所有“ scroll”事件封装在两个“ scroll-begin”和“ scroll-end”信号之间。

trans-unit.source: In the case that symbols are not explicitly added; GTK will uses GModule’s introspective features (by opening the module NULL) to look at the application’s symbol table. From here it tries to match the signal function names given in the interface description with symbols in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在没有显式添加符号的情况下；GTK将使用GModule的自省功能（通过打开模块 NULL ）来查看应用程序的符号表。从这里开始，它尝试将接口说明中给出的信号功能名称与应用程序中的符号进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: In the case that the action target is a string with no unusual characters (ie: only alphanumeric, plus “-” and “.”) then you can use a detailed action name of the form “justify::left” to specify the justify action with a target of left.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作目标是没有异常字符的字符串（即：仅字母数字，加上“-”和“。”），则可以使用形式为“ justify :: left”的详细操作名称来指定对齐以左目标为目标的动作。

trans-unit.source: In the case that the action target is not a string, or contains unusual characters, you can use the more general format “action-name(5)”, where the “5” here is any valid text-format GVariant (ie: a string that can be parsed by g_variant_parse()). Another example is “open-bookmark(‘http://gnome.org/’)”.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作目标不是字符串或包含不寻常的字符，则可以使用更通用的格式“ action-name（5）”，其中“ 5”是任何有效的文本格式GVariant（即：a可以由 g_variant_parse() 解析的字符串。另一个示例是“ open-bookmark（'http://gnome.org/'）”。

trans-unit.source: In the example above, an assistive technology will read the button’s accessible label as “Download Final report.pdf”.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，辅助技术将读取按钮的可访问标签为“ Download Final report.pdf”。

trans-unit.source: In the example above, the “label” property will override the contents of the label widget.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，“ label”属性将覆盖标签小部件的内容。

trans-unit.source: In the first phase (the “capture” phase) the event is delivered to each widget from the top-most (the top-level GtkWindow or grab widget) down to the target GtkWidget. Event controllers that are attached with GTK_PHASE_CAPTURE get a chance to react to the event.
trans-unit.target: 在第一阶段（“捕获”阶段），事件将从最顶层（顶层GtkWindow或抓取小部件）一直传递到每个小部件，再到目标GtkWidget。 GTK_PHASE_CAPTURE 附带的事件控制器有机会对事件做出反应。

trans-unit.source: In the last phase (the “bubble” phase), the event is delivered to each widget from the target to the top-most, and event controllers attached with GTK_PHASE_BUBBLE are run.
trans-unit.target: 在最后一个阶段（“气泡”阶段），事件从目标到最顶层传递到每个窗口小部件，并运行与 GTK_PHASE_BUBBLE 关联的事件控制器。

trans-unit.source: In the long tradition of programming languages and libraries, this example is called Hello, World.
trans-unit.target: 在编程语言和库的悠久传统中，此示例称为Hello，World。

trans-unit.target: 在指定的方向上按指定的量增加或减少旋转按钮的值。

trans-unit.source: Increments the reference count on section .
trans-unit.target: 上递增引用计数 section 。

trans-unit.source: Index of all symbols
trans-unit.target: 所有符号的索引

trans-unit.source: Index of the item to remove
trans-unit.target: 要删除项目的索引

trans-unit.source: Indicates a duplicate path (e.g. when adding a bookmark).
trans-unit.target: 表示重复的路径(如添加书签时)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates a malformed filename.
trans-unit.target: 表示错误的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Indicates an Open mode for selecting folders. The file chooser will let the user pick an existing folder.
trans-unit.target: 表示选择文件夹的打开模式。文件选择器会让用户选择一个现有的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Indicates an incomplete hostname (e.g. "http://foo" without a slash after that).
trans-unit.target: 表示不完整的主机名(如 "http://foo",后面没有斜线)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if items in a table or grid are sorted in ascending or descending order. Possible property values are in the GtkAccessibleSort enumeration. Value type: GtkAccessibleSort
trans-unit.target: 指示表或网格中的项目是按升序还是降序排序。可能的属性值在GtkAccessibleSort枚举中。值类型：GtkAccessibleSort

trans-unit.source: Indicates keyboard shortcuts that an author has implemented to activate or give focus to an element. Value type: string
trans-unit.target: 表示作者为激活或关注某个元素而使用的键盘快捷键。值类型:字符串

trans-unit.source: Indicates open mode. The file chooser will only let the user pick an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 表示打开模式。文件选择器只会让用户选择一个现有的文件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates save mode. The file chooser will let the user pick an existing file, or type in a new filename.
trans-unit.target: 表示保存模式。文件选择器将让用户选择一个现有的文件,或输入一个新的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 表示文件不存在。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that editing finished on renderer and that editable should be removed from the owning cell-layouting widget.
trans-unit.target: 指示应在 renderer 完成编辑，并且应将其从 editable 单元的布局小部件中删除。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that editing has started on renderer and that editable should be added to the owning cell-layouting widget at cell_area .
trans-unit.target: 指示已在 renderer 上开始编辑，并且应将可 editable 添加到 cell_area 所属的单元布局小部件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that focus changed on this area . This signal is emitted either as a result of focus handling or event handling.
trans-unit.target: 表示焦点已更改为该 area 。由于焦点处理或事件处理而发出此信号。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that some progress has been made, but you don’t know how much. Causes the progress bar to enter “activity mode,” where a block bounces back and forth. Each call to gtk_progress_bar_pulse() causes the block to move by a little bit (the amount of movement per pulse is determined by gtk_progress_bar_set_pulse_step()).
trans-unit.target: 表示已经取得了一些进展，但是您不知道有多少。使进度条进入“活动模式”，在该模式下，一个块来回弹跳。每次调用 gtk_progress_bar_pulse() 都会使块移动一点（每个脉冲的移动量由 gtk_progress_bar_set_pulse_step() 确定）。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that some progress is made, but you don’t know how much. Causes the entry’s progress indicator to enter “activity mode,” where a block bounces back and forth. Each call to gtk_entry_progress_pulse() causes the block to move by a little bit (the amount of movement per pulse is determined by gtk_entry_set_progress_pulse_step()).
trans-unit.target: 表示已取得一些进展，但您不知道有多少。使条目的进度指示器进入“活动模式”，在该模式下，一个块来回弹跳。每次调用 gtk_entry_progress_pulse() 都会使块移动一点（每个脉冲的移动量由 gtk_entry_set_progress_pulse_step() 确定）。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the element is not editable, but is otherwise operable. Value type: boolean
trans-unit.target: 表示该元素不可编辑,但可以操作。值类型:布尔值

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the user may select more than one item from the current selectable descendants. Value type: boolean
trans-unit.target: 表示用户可以从当前可选择的子代中选择多个项目。值类型:布尔值

trans-unit.source: Indicates that user input is required on the element before a form may be submitted. Value type: boolean
trans-unit.target: 表示在提交表单之前,需要用户输入元素。值类型:布尔值

trans-unit.source: Indicates the availability and type of interactive popup element, such as menu or dialog, that can be triggered by an element.
trans-unit.target: 表示交互式弹出元素(如菜单或对话框)的可用性和类型,可由元素触发。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the current state of a GtkCheckButton
trans-unit.target: 指示GtkCheckButton的当前状态

trans-unit.source: Indicates the current state of a GtkToggleButton
trans-unit.target: 指示GtkToggleButton的当前状态

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a text box accepts multiple lines of input or only a single line. Value type: boolean
trans-unit.target: 表示文本框是接受多行输入还是只接受单行输入。值类型:布尔值

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether an element is modal when displayed. Value type: boolean
trans-unit.target: 表示元素显示时是否为模态。值类型:布尔值

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether editing on the cell has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否取消了单元格的编辑。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether inputting text could trigger display of one or more predictions of the user's intended value for a combobox, searchbox, or textbox and specifies how predictions would be presented if they were made. Value type: GtkAccessibleAutocomplete
trans-unit.target: 指示输入文本是否可以触发组合框，搜索框或文本框的用户预期值的一个或多个预测的显示，并指​​定如果进行预测将如何呈现。值类型：GtkAccessibleAutocomplete

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the buffer has been modified since the last call to gtk_text_buffer_set_modified() set the modification flag to FALSE. Used for example to enable a “save” function in a text editor.
trans-unit.target: 指示自上次调用 gtk_text_buffer_set_modified() 以来，是否已修改缓冲区，将修改标志设置为 FALSE 。例如，用于在文本编辑器中启用“保存”功能。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the buffer has some text currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 表示缓冲区当前是否有一些文字被选中。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the element's orientation is horizontal, vertical, or unknown/ambiguous. Value type: GtkOrientation
trans-unit.target: 指示元素的方向是水平，垂直还是未知/模糊。值类型：GtkOrientation

trans-unit.source: Inform the session manager that certain types of actions should be inhibited. This is not guaranteed to work on all platforms and for all types of actions.
trans-unit.target: 告知会话管理器应禁止某些类型的操作。这并不保证对所有平台和所有类型的操作都有效。

trans-unit.source: Information about OpenGL
trans-unit.target: 关于OpenGL的信息

trans-unit.source: Information about Vulkan
trans-unit.target: 关于Vulkan的信息

trans-unit.source: Information about clipboards
trans-unit.target: 关于剪贴板的信息

trans-unit.source: Information about cursor objects (only win32)
trans-unit.target: 关于光标对象的信息(仅win32)

trans-unit.source: Information about drag-and-drop
trans-unit.target: 关于拖放的信息

trans-unit.source: Information about event loop operation (mostly Quartz)
trans-unit.target: 关于事件循环操作的信息(主要是石英

trans-unit.source: Information about fallbacks
trans-unit.target: 关于后退的信息

trans-unit.source: Information about glyph caching
trans-unit.target: 有关字形缓存的信息

trans-unit.source: Information about selections
trans-unit.target: 关于选择的信息

trans-unit.source: Information about the frame clock
trans-unit.target: 关于帧时钟的信息

trans-unit.source: Information about the system on which the program is running. This is displayed in a separate tab, therefore it is fine to use a long multi-paragraph text. Note that the text should contain the intended linebreaks.
trans-unit.target: 关于程序运行的系统信息。这些信息显示在一个单独的选项卡中,因此可以使用一个长的多段文字。请注意,文本应包含预定的换行符。

trans-unit.source: Information about xsettings
trans-unit.target: 关于xsettings的信息

trans-unit.source: Informational message
trans-unit.target: 信息性信息

trans-unit.source: Informs the cell renderer that the editing is stopped. If canceled is TRUE, the cell renderer will emit the “editing-canceled” signal.
trans-unit.target: 通知单元格渲染器编辑已停止。如果 canceled 为 TRUE ，则单元格渲染器将发出“取消编辑”信号。

trans-unit.source: Inhibit ending the user session by logging out or by shutting down the computer
trans-unit.target: 禁止通过注销或关闭计算机来结束用户会话。

trans-unit.source: Inhibit suspending the session or computer
trans-unit.target: 禁止暂停会话或计算机

trans-unit.source: Inhibit the session being marked as idle (and possibly locked)
trans-unit.target: 禁止将会话标记为空闲(并可能锁定)。

trans-unit.source: Inhibit user switching
trans-unit.target: 禁止用户切换

trans-unit.source: Initialization
trans-unit.target: Initialization

trans-unit.source: Initialization — Library initialization and main loop
trans-unit.target: 初始化-库初始化和主循环

trans-unit.source: Initialized iter with the first position in the text buffer. This is the same as using gtk_text_buffer_get_iter_at_offset() to get the iter at character offset 0.
trans-unit.target: 用文本缓冲区中的第一个位置初始化 iter 。这与使用 gtk_text_buffer_get_iter_at_offset() 获取字符偏移量0处的迭代器相同。

trans-unit.source: Initializes iter to a position char_offset chars from the start of the entire buffer. If char_offset is -1 or greater than the number of characters in the buffer, iter is initialized to the end iterator, the iterator one past the last valid character in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 从整个缓冲区的开始处将 iter 初始化到 char_offset chars的位置。如果 char_offset 为-1或大于缓冲区中的字符数，则将 iter 初始化为结束迭代器，该迭代器比缓冲区中的最后一个有效字符晚一个迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes iter to point to target . If target is not found, finds the next value after it. If no value >= target exists in set , this function returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 iter 以指向 target 。如果找不到 target 则在其后找到下一个值。如果 set 中不存在任何值> = target ，则此函数返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes iter to the start of the given line. If line_number is greater than the number of lines in the buffer , the end iterator is returned.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 iter 到给定行的开头。如果 line_number 大于 buffer 的行数，则返回结束迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes iter with the “end iterator,” one past the last valid character in the text buffer. If dereferenced with gtk_text_iter_get_char(), the end iterator has a character value of 0. The entire buffer lies in the range from the first position in the buffer (call gtk_text_buffer_get_start_iter() to get character position 0) to the end iterator.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 iter 用“结束迭代，”一个过去在文本缓冲区中最后一个有效字符。如果使用 gtk_text_iter_get_char() 取消引用，则最终迭代器的字符值为0。整个缓冲区位于从缓冲区中第一个位置（调用 gtk_text_buffer_get_start_iter() 以获取字符位置0）到最终迭代器的范围内。

trans-unit.source: Initializes iter with the current position of mark .
trans-unit.target: 用 mark 的当前位置初始化 iter 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes iter with the first iterator in the tree (the one at the path "0") and returns TRUE. Returns FALSE if the tree is empty.
trans-unit.target: 使用树中的第一个迭代器（路径“ 0”处的一个）初始化 iter 并返回 TRUE 。如果树为空，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes value with the appropriate type for the property .
trans-unit.target: 使用 property 的适当类型初始化 value 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes value with the appropriate type for the relation .
trans-unit.target: 使用适当的类型为 relation 初始化 value 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes value with the appropriate type for the state .
trans-unit.target: 使用适合于该 state 类型初始化 value 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an iterator for set and points it to the first value in set . If set is empty, FALSE is returned and value is set to G_MAXUINT.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个迭代器 set ，它指向的第一个值 set 。如果 set 为空，则返回 FALSE ，并将 value 设置为 G_MAXUINT 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an iterator for set and points it to the last value in set . If set is empty, FALSE is returned.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个迭代器 set ，它指向的最后一个值 set 。如果 set 为空，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes and sets value to that at column .
trans-unit.target: 初始化并设置 value 到在 column 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes and sets value to that at column.
trans-unit.target: 初始化并将其设置为列的值。

trans-unit.source: Initially, a GtkAppChooserButton selects the first application in its list, which will either be the most-recently used application or, if “show-default-item” is TRUE, the default application.
trans-unit.target: 最初，GtkAppChooserButton在其列表中选择第一个应用程序，它将是最近使用的应用程序，或者，如果“ show-default-item”为 TRUE ，则为默认应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Input values must be in the [0.0, 1.0] range; output values will be in the same range.
trans-unit.target: 输入值必须在[0.0,1.0]范围内;输出值将在同一范围内。

trans-unit.source: Input widgets can be given the focus by clicking on them, but focus can also be moved around with certain key events (this is known as “keyboard navigation”). GTK reserves the Tab key to move the focus to the next location, and Shift-Tab to move it back to the previous one. In addition many containers allow “directional navigation” with the arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过单击输入小部件来为其赋予焦点，但是也可以通过某些键事件来移动焦点（这被称为“键盘导航”）。GTK保留Tab键将焦点移到下一个位置，而Shift-Tab则将焦点移回到上一个位置。此外，许多容器还可以使用箭头键进行“定向导航”。

trans-unit.source: Insert a page into notebook at the given position, specifying the widget to use as the label in the popup menu.
trans-unit.target: 将页面插入给定位置的 notebook 中，在弹出菜单中指定要用作标签的小部件。

trans-unit.source: Insert a page into notebook at the given position.
trans-unit.target: 将页面插入给定位置的 notebook 中。

trans-unit.source: Insert the child into the box at position . If a sort function is set, the widget will actually be inserted at the calculated position.
trans-unit.target: 将 child 插入 box 的 position 。如果设置了排序功能，则小部件将实际插入到计算出的位置。

trans-unit.source: Inserts child in the position after sibling in the list of box children. If sibling is NULL, insert child at the first position.
trans-unit.target: 插入 child 在后的位置 sibling 在列表 box 的孩子。如果 sibling 为 NULL ，则在第一个位置插入 child 。

trans-unit.source: Inserts group into widget . Children of widget that implement GtkActionable can then be associated with actions in group by setting their “action-name” to prefix .action-name.
trans-unit.target: 将 group 插入 widget 。然后，通过将 widget 的“ action-name”设置为 prefix ,可以将实现GtkActionable的widget的子级与 group 的actions关联。 action-name 。

trans-unit.source: Inserts len bytes of text at position iter . If len is -1, text must be nul-terminated and will be inserted in its entirety. Emits the “insert-text” signal; insertion actually occurs in the default handler for the signal. iter is invalidated when insertion occurs (because the buffer contents change), but the default signal handler revalidates it to point to the end of the inserted text.
trans-unit.target: 在位置 iter 处插入 len 个字节的 text 。如果 len 为-1，则 text 必须以nul结尾，并将全部插入。发出“插入文本”信号；插入实际上发生在信号的默认处理程序中。当插入发生时 iter 无效（因为缓冲区内容更改），但是默认的信号处理程序将其重新验证为指向插入文本的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Inserts length bytes of text into the contents of the widget, at position position .
trans-unit.target: 将 text length 字节插入小部件的内容中，位置为 position 。

trans-unit.source: Inserts n_chars characters of chars into the contents of the buffer, at position position .
trans-unit.target: 插入 n_chars 的字符 chars 到缓冲器的内容中，在位置 position 。

trans-unit.source: Inserts text at position in the list of strings stored in combo_box .
trans-unit.target: 插入 text 的 position 存储在字符串列表 combo_box 。

trans-unit.source: Inserts text at position in the list of strings stored in combo_box . If id is non-NULL then it is used as the ID of the row. See “id-column”.
trans-unit.target: 插入 text 的 position 存储在字符串列表 combo_box 。如果 id 为非 NULL ,则将其用作行的ID。请参阅“ id-column”。

trans-unit.source: Inserts text into buffer at iter , applying the list of tags to the newly-inserted text. The last tag specified must be NULL to terminate the list. Equivalent to calling gtk_text_buffer_insert(), then gtk_text_buffer_apply_tag() on the inserted text; gtk_text_buffer_insert_with_tags() is just a convenience function.
trans-unit.target: 将 text 插入 iter 的 buffer 中，将标签列表应用于新插入的文本。指定的最后一个标记必须为 NULL 才能终止列表。相当于调用 gtk_text_buffer_insert() ，然后 gtk_text_buffer_apply_tag() 插入的文本; gtk_text_buffer_insert_with_tags() 只是一个便捷功能。

trans-unit.source: Inserts widget into the child widget list of parent .
trans-unit.target: 将 widget 插入 parent 的子窗口小部件列表中。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a child widget anchor into the text buffer at iter . The anchor will be counted as one character in character counts, and when obtaining the buffer contents as a string, will be represented by the Unicode “object replacement character” 0xFFFC. Note that the “slice” variants for obtaining portions of the buffer as a string include this character for child anchors, but the “text” variants do not. E.g. see gtk_text_buffer_get_slice() and gtk_text_buffer_get_text(). Consider gtk_text_buffer_create_child_anchor() as a more convenient alternative to this function. The buffer will add a reference to the anchor, so you can unref it after insertion.
trans-unit.target: 在 iter 将子窗口小部件锚点插入文本缓冲区。锚点在字符计数中将被视为一个字符，并且当以字符串形式获取缓冲区内容时，将由Unicode“对象替换字符” 0xFFFC表示。请注意，用于将缓冲区的一部分作为字符串获取的“ slice”变体包括用于子锚的此字符，而“ text”变体则不包括。例如，参见 gtk_text_buffer_get_slice() 和 gtk_text_buffer_get_text() 。考虑将 gtk_text_buffer_create_child_anchor() 作为此函数的更方便替代方法。缓冲区将添加对锚的引用，因此您可以在插入后取消引用。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a column at the given position in the columns of self .
trans-unit.target: 在 self 的列中的给定位置插入一列。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a column at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置插入一列。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a debug node with a message. Debug nodes don't affect the rendering at all, but can be helpful in identifying parts of a render node tree dump, for example in the GTK inspector.
trans-unit.target: 插入一个带有消息的调试节点.调试节点完全不影响渲染,但可以帮助识别渲染节点树转储的部分,例如在GTK检查器中。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new row after sibling . If sibling is NULL, then the row will be prepended to parent ’s children. If parent and sibling are NULL, then the row will be prepended to the toplevel. If both sibling and parent are set, then parent must be the parent of sibling . When sibling is set, parent is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在 sibling 后插入新行。如果 sibling 为 NULL ，则该行将添加到 parent 的子级之前。如果 parent 和 sibling 为 NULL ，则该行将位于顶层。如果同时设置了 sibling 和 parent ，则 parent 必须是 sibling 的父级。当 sibling 设置， parent 是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new row after sibling . If sibling is NULL, then the row will be prepended to the beginning of the list. iter will be changed to point to this new row. The row will be empty after this function is called. To fill in values, you need to call gtk_list_store_set() or gtk_list_store_set_value().
trans-unit.target: 在 sibling 后插入新行。如果 sibling 为 NULL ，则该行将位于列表的开头。 iter 将更改为指向此新行。调用此函数后，该行将为空。要填写值，您需要调用 gtk_list_store_set() 或 gtk_list_store_set_value() 。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new row before sibling . If sibling is NULL, then the row will be appended to parent ’s children. If parent and sibling are NULL, then the row will be appended to the toplevel. If both sibling and parent are set, then parent must be the parent of sibling . When sibling is set, parent is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在 sibling 之前插入新行。如果 sibling 为 NULL ，则该行将追加到 parent 的孩子的后面。如果 parent 和 sibling 为 NULL ，则该行将追加到顶层。如果同时设置了 sibling 和 parent ，则 parent 必须是 sibling 的父级。当 sibling 设置， parent 是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new row before sibling . If sibling is NULL, then the row will be appended to the end of the list. iter will be changed to point to this new row. The row will be empty after this function is called. To fill in values, you need to call gtk_list_store_set() or gtk_list_store_set_value().
trans-unit.target: 在 sibling 之前插入新行。如果 sibling 为 NULL ，则该行将追加到列表的末尾。 iter 将更改为指向此新行。调用此函数后，该行将为空。要填写值，您需要调用 gtk_list_store_set() 或 gtk_list_store_set_value() 。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a page in the assistant at a given position.
trans-unit.target: 在 assistant 中的给定位置插入页面。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a row at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置插入一行。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a row or column at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置插入一行或一列。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an image into the text buffer at iter . The image will be counted as one character in character counts, and when obtaining the buffer contents as a string, will be represented by the Unicode “object replacement character” 0xFFFC. Note that the “slice” variants for obtaining portions of the buffer as a string include this character for paintable, but the “text” variants do not. e.g. see gtk_text_buffer_get_slice() and gtk_text_buffer_get_text().
trans-unit.target: 将图像插入 iter 中的文本缓冲区。该图像将被视为字符计数中的一个字符，并且当以字符串形式获取缓冲区内容时，将由Unicode“对象替换字符” 0xFFFC表示。请注意，用于将缓冲区的部分作为字符串获取的“ slice”变体包括此字符以进行绘制，但“ text”变体则不包括。例如，参见 gtk_text_buffer_get_slice() 和 gtk_text_buffer_get_text() 。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the widget into box at position .

trans-unit.source: Inserts the text in markup at position iter . markup will be inserted in its entirety and must be nul-terminated and valid UTF-8. Emits the “insert-text” signal, possibly multiple times; insertion actually occurs in the default handler for the signal. iter will point to the end of the inserted text on return.
trans-unit.target: 将文本插入 markup 中 iter 的位置。 markup 将全部插入，并且必须为零终止且有效的UTF-8。发出“插入文本”信号，可能多次；插入实际上发生在信号的默认处理程序中。 iter 将在返回时指向插入的文本的末尾。

trans-unit.target: 为给定 expression 安装一个监视，每当对 self 的评估可能发生更改时，该监视就会调用 notify 函数。

trans-unit.source: Installs an action called action_name on widget_class and binds its state to the value of the property_name property.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the GtkListStore was originally implemented with a linked list with a tail pointer. As a result, it was fast at data insertion and deletion, and not fast at random data access. The GtkListStore sets the GTK_TREE_MODEL_ITERS_PERSIST flag, which means that GtkTreeIters can be cached while the row exists. Thus, if access to a particular row is needed often and your code is expected to run on older versions of GTK, it is worth keeping the iter around.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，GtkListStore最初是通过带有尾指针的链表实现的。结果，它的数据插入和删除速度很快，而随机数据的访问速度却不快。所述GtkListStore设置GTK_TREE_MODEL_ITERS_PERSIST标志，这意味着GtkTreeIters，同时行存在被缓存。因此，如果经常需要访问特定的行，并且您的代码希望在旧版本的GTK上运行，那么值得反复进行。

trans-unit.source: Interprets the values as a 2-dimensional boolean grid with the given stride and inside that grid, adds a rectangle with the given width and height .
trans-unit.target: 将值解释为具有给定 stride 网格，并在该网格内部，添加具有给定 width 和 height 的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Interprets the values as a 2-dimensional boolean grid with the given stride and inside that grid, removes a rectangle with the given width and height .
trans-unit.target: 将值解释为具有给定 stride 网格，并在该网格内，删除具有给定 width 和 height 的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the virtual render function of the GtkCellRenderer. The three passed-in rectangles are areas in cr . Most renderers will draw within cell_area ; the xalign, yalign, xpad, and ypad fields of the GtkCellRenderer should be honored with respect to cell_area . background_area includes the blank space around the cell, and also the area containing the tree expander; so the background_area rectangles for all cells tile to cover the entire window .
trans-unit.target: 调用GtkCellRenderer的虚拟渲染功能。三个传入的矩形是 cr 中的区域。大多数渲染器将在 cell_area 内绘制；在xalign，yalign的的的XPad，并YPAD领域GtkCellRenderer应该相对于荣幸 cell_area 。 background_area 包括单元格周围的空白区域，以及包含树扩展器的区域；因此，所有单元格的 background_area 矩形将覆盖整个 window 。

trans-unit.source: Is emitted whenever a new message gets pushed onto a statusbar's stack.

trans-unit.target: 每当有新的消息从状态栏的堆栈中弹出时,就会发出。

trans-unit.source: It allows placing children at the start or the end. In addition, it contains an internal centered box which is centered with respect to the full width of the box, even if the children at either side take up different amounts of space.

trans-unit.source: It behaves like gtk_widget_grab_focus(), except that it doesn't select the contents of self . You only want to call this on some special entries which the user usually doesn't want to replace all text in, such as search-as-you-type entries.

trans-unit.target: 但是,如果偏移量太大,或者切片的模型没有足够的项目,它可以有更少的项目。

trans-unit.source: It is a good idea to use the customary msgid “translator-credits” for this purpose, since translators will already know the purpose of that msgid, and since GtkAboutDialog will detect if “translator-credits” is untranslated and hide the tab.

trans-unit.source: It is also important that developers save state they care about in the item and do not rely on the widgets they created as those widgets can be recycled for a new position at any time causing any state to be lost.
trans-unit.target: 同样重要的是,开发人员要将他们关心的状态保存在项目中,不要依赖他们创建的小部件,因为这些小部件可以随时回收到新的位置,导致任何状态都会丢失。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to bind a property value to another object's property value using the attributes "bind-source" to specify the source object of the binding, and optionally, "bind-property" and "bind-flags" to specify the source property and source binding flags respectively. Internally builder implements this using GBinding objects. For more information see g_object_bind_property()
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用属性“ bind-source”将属性值绑定到另一个对象的属性值，以指定绑定的源对象，还可以使用“ bind-property”和“ bind-flags”指定源属性和源绑定标志。builder内部使用GBinding对象实现此目的。有关更多信息，请参见 g_object_bind_property()

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to embed the UI description in the source code as a string and use gtk_builder_add_from_string() to load it. But keeping the UI description in a separate file has several advantages: It is then possible to make minor adjustments to the UI without recompiling your program, and, more importantly, graphical UI editors such as glade can load the file and allow you to create and modify your UI by point-and-click.
trans-unit.target: 也可以将UI描述作为字符串嵌入到源代码中，并使用 gtk_builder_add_from_string() 进行加载。但是将UI描述保存在单独的文件中有几个优点：然后可以对UI进行细微调整而无需重新编译程序，更重要的是，图形化的UI编辑器（例如glade）可以加载文件并允许您创建和通过点击修改您的用户界面。

trans-unit.target: 也可以使用 gtk_application_set_menubar() 手动提供菜单栏。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to specify a theme variant to load, by appending the variant name with a colon, like this: GTK_THEME=Adwaita:dark.

trans-unit.source: It is called after completion of page drawing (e.g. drawing in another thread). If gtk_print_operation_set_defer_drawing() was called before, then this function has to be called by application. In another case it is called by the library itself.
trans-unit.target: 在完成页面绘制（例如，在另一个线程中绘制）后调用它。如果 gtk_print_operation_set_defer_drawing() 调用过gtk_print_operation_set_defer_drawing（），则此功能必须由应用程序调用。在另一种情况下，它是由库本身调用的。

trans-unit.source: It is commonly combined with GtkMediaControls to give the user a way to control the playback.
trans-unit.target: 它通常与GtkMediaControls结合使用，为用户提供一种控制播放的方法。

trans-unit.source: It is expected that models fill in the iterator with private data. For example, the GtkListStore model, which is internally a simple linked list, stores a list node in one of the pointers. The GtkTreeModelSort stores an array and an offset in two of the pointers. Additionally, there is an integer field. This field is generally filled with a unique stamp per model. This stamp is for catching errors resulting from using invalid iterators with a model.
trans-unit.target: 期望模型将私有数据填充到迭代器中。例如，GtkListStore模型在内部是一个简单的链接列表，它在一个指针中存储一个列表节点。所述GtkTreeModelSort存储阵列，并在两个指针的偏移量。此外，还有一个整数字段。每个模型通常在此字段中填充唯一的图章。该戳记用于捕获因对模型使用无效迭代器而导致的错误。

trans-unit.source: It is important to be aware of the difference between items and positions because the mapping from position to item is not permanent, so developers should think about whether they want to track items or positions when working with models. Oftentimes some things are really hard to do one way but very easy the other way.
trans-unit.target: 要注意项目和位置的区别,因为从位置到项目的映射并不是永久的,所以开发者在处理模型时应该考虑是要跟踪项目还是位置。很多时候,有些事情用一种方式做起来真的很难,但用另一种方式却非常容易。

trans-unit.source: It is important to call this function in the instance initializer of a GtkWidget subclass and not in GObject.constructed() or GObject.constructor() for two reasons.
trans-unit.target: 出于两个原因，在GtkWidget子类的实例初始值设定项中而不是 GObject.constructed() 或 GObject.constructor() 中调用此函数很重要。

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that a layout is defined by the totality of constraints; removing a child, or a constraint, from an existing layout without changing the remaining constraints may result in an unstable or unsolvable layout.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,一个布局是由全部约束条件定义的;在不改变其余约束条件的情况下,从现有布局中删除一个子约束条件或约束条件,可能会导致布局不稳定或无法解决。

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that only the methods gtk_list_store_insert_with_values() and gtk_list_store_insert_with_valuesv() are atomic, in the sense that the row is being appended to the store and the values filled in in a single operation with regard to GtkTreeModel signaling. In contrast, using e.g. gtk_list_store_append() and then gtk_list_store_set() will first create a row, which triggers the “row-inserted” signal on GtkListStore. The row, however, is still empty, and any signal handler connecting to “row-inserted” on this particular store should be prepared for the situation that the row might be empty. This is especially important if you are wrapping the GtkListStore inside a GtkTreeModelFilter and are using a GtkTreeModelFilterVisibleFunc. Using any of the non-atomic operations to append rows to the GtkListStore will cause the GtkTreeModelFilterVisibleFunc to be visited with an empty row first; the function must be prepared for that.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要注意，就行被添加到存储中以及关于GtkTreeModel信令的单个操作中填写的值而言，只有方法 gtk_list_store_insert_with_values() 和 gtk_list_store_insert_with_valuesv() 是原子的。相反，使用 gtk_list_store_append() 然后使用 gtk_list_store_set() 首先将创建一行，这会触发GtkListStore上的“行插入”信号。但是，该行仍然为空，并且任何连接到“行插入”的信号处理程序在该特定存储上应该为行可能为空的情况做好准备。如果你的包裹，这一点尤其重要GtkListStore一个内部GtkTreeModelFilter并使用GtkTreeModelFilterVisibleFunc。使用任何非原子操作将行追加到GtkListStore都会导致GtkTreeModelFilterVisibleFunc首先以空行进行访问；该功能必须为此做好准备。

trans-unit.source: It is modeled after GtkEventControllerMotion so if you have used that, this should feel really familiar.
trans-unit.target: 它是根据GtkEventControllerMotion建模的，因此，如果您使用过它，应该会感到非常熟悉。

trans-unit.target: 它不需要调用这个函数来使媒体流工作。

trans-unit.source: It primarily consists of two properties: “action-name” and “action-target”. There are also some convenience APIs for setting these properties.
trans-unit.target: 它主要由两个属性组成：“ action-name”和“ action-target”。还有一些方便的API用于设置这些属性。

trans-unit.source: It uses subnodes with names overshoot and undershoot to draw the overflow and underflow indications. These nodes get the .left, .right, .top or .bottom style class added depending on where the indication is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 它使用名称为过冲和欠冲的子节点来绘制溢流和欠流指示。这些节点会根据指示的绘制位置被添加.left、.right、.top或.bottom样式类。

trans-unit.source: It will be placed after previous_sibling , or at the beginning if previous_sibling is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 它将放置在 previous_sibling 之后，或者如果 previous_sibling 为 NULL 则放置在开头。

trans-unit.source: It will be placed before next_sibling , or at the end if next_sibling is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 它将放置在 next_sibling 之前，或者如果 next_sibling 为 NULL 则放置在末尾。

trans-unit.source: It will in turn call g_test_init() and gtk_init() to properly initialize the testing framework and graphical toolkit. It’ll also set the program’s locale to “C”. This is done to make test program environments as deterministic as possible.
trans-unit.target: 依次调用 g_test_init() 和 gtk_init() 正确初始化测试框架和图形工具包。还将程序的语言环境设置为“ C”。这样做是为了使测试程序环境尽可能确定。

trans-unit.source: It will not work to use the wrapper function gtk_widget_measure() inside your own GtkWidgetClass.size-allocate() implementation. These return a request adjusted by GtkSizeGroup, the widget's align and expand flags as well as its CSS style. If a widget used the wrappers inside its virtual method implementations, then the adjustments (such as widget margins) would be applied twice. GTK therefore does not allow this and will warn if you try to do it.
trans-unit.target: 在您自己的 GtkWidgetClass.size-allocate() 使用包装函数 gtk_widget_measure() 无效 allocate() 执行。它们返回一个由GtkSizeGroup调整的请求，该窗口小部件的align和expand标志及其CSS样式。如果窗口小部件在其虚拟方法实现中使用了包装器，则将进行两次调整（例如窗口小部件边距）。因此，GTK不允许这样做，如果尝试这样做，则会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: It will show an inactive symbolic “find” icon when the search entry is empty, and a symbolic “clear” icon when there is text. Clicking on the “clear” icon will empty the search entry.
trans-unit.target: 当搜索条目为空时，它将显示一个不活动的符号“查找”图标，当出现文本时将显示一个符号“清除”图标。单击“清除”图标将清空搜索条目。

trans-unit.source: It’s also important for areas to maintain some cell alignments with areas rendered for adjacent rows (cells can appear “columnized” inside an area even when the size of cells are different in each row). For this reason the GtkCellArea uses a GtkCellAreaContext object to store the alignments and sizes along the way (as well as the overall largest minimum and natural size for all the rows which have been calculated with the said context).
trans-unit.target: 对于区域来说，保持与相邻行渲染的区域的某些单元格对齐也很重要（即使每行中的单元格大小不同，单元格也可能在区域内“列为一列”）。因此，GtkCellArea使用GtkCellAreaContext对象来存储沿途的对齐方式和大小（以及使用所述上下文计算出的所有行的整体最大最小和自然大小）。

trans-unit.source: It’s not really reasonable to attempt to handle failures of this call. The only reasonable thing to do when an error is detected is to call g_error().
trans-unit.target: 尝试处理此调用的失败不是很合理。检测到错误时，唯一合理的做法是调用 g_error() 。

trans-unit.source: It’s not really reasonable to attempt to handle failures of this call. You should not use this function with untrusted files (ie: files that are not part of your application). Broken GtkBuilder files can easily crash your program, and it’s possible that memory was leaked leading up to the reported failure. The only reasonable thing to do when an error is detected is to call g_error().
trans-unit.target: 尝试处理此调用的失败不是很合理。您不应将此功能用于不受​​信任的文件（即，不属于应用程序的文件）。损坏的GtkBuilder文件很容易使您的程序崩溃，并且内存泄漏可能导致报告的故障。检测到错误时，唯一合理的做法是调用 g_error() 。

trans-unit.source: It’s permitted to call this function before showing a window, in which case the window will be maximized when it appears onscreen initially.
trans-unit.target: 允许在显示窗口之前调用此函数，在这种情况下，当窗口最初显示在屏幕上时，该窗口将最大化。

trans-unit.source: It’s permitted to call this function before showing a window, in which case the window will be minimized before it ever appears onscreen.
trans-unit.target: 允许在显示窗口之前调用此函数，在这种情况下，将最小化窗口，然后再将其显示在屏幕上。

trans-unit.target: 也可以指定多个谓词,以及它们的强度。

trans-unit.source: Its also possible to enumerate the settings so that you can easily save the settings for the next time your app runs, or even store them in a document. The predefined keys try to use shared values as much as possible so that moving such a document between systems still works.
trans-unit.target: 它还可以列举设置,这样您就可以轻松地保存设置,以便在您的应用程序下次运行时使用,甚至可以将它们存储在文档中。预定义的键尽量使用共享值,这样在系统之间移动这样的文档还是可以的。

trans-unit.source: Its position and movement are controlled by the adjustment that is passed to or created by gtk_scrollbar_new(). See GtkAdjustment for more details. The “value” field sets the position of the thumb and must be between “lower” and “upper” - “page-size”. The “page-size” represents the size of the visible scrollable area. The fields “step-increment” and “page-increment” fields are added to or subtracted from the “value” when the user asks to move by a step (using e.g. the cursor arrow keys) or by a page (using e.g. the Page Down/Up keys).
trans-unit.target: 它的位置和移动由传递给 gtk_scrollbar_new() 或由gtk_scrollbar_new（）创建的调整控制。有关更多详细信息，请参见GtkAdjustment。该“值”字段设置滑块的位置，并且必须之间“下部”和“上部” - “页大小”。在“页面大小”表示可见滚动区域的大小。字段“步骤递增”和“页增量”字段被添加到或从中减去“值”当用户要求通过一个步骤（例如，使用光标方向键）来移动，或者用页（例如，使用的页向下/向上键）。

trans-unit.source: Labels can automatically wrap text if you call gtk_label_set_wrap().
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 gtk_label_set_wrap() ,标签可以自动换行。

trans-unit.source: Labels can be made selectable with gtk_label_set_selectable(). Selectable labels allow the user to copy the label contents to the clipboard. Only labels that contain useful-to-copy information — such as error messages — should be made selectable.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 gtk_label_set_selectable() 来选择标签。可选标签允许用户将标签内容复制到剪贴板。只有包含有用的复制信息的标签（例如错误消息）才应该被选择。

trans-unit.source: Labels may contain “mnemonics”. Mnemonics are underlined characters in the label, used for keyboard navigation. Mnemonics are created by providing a string with an underscore before the mnemonic character, such as "_File", to the functions gtk_label_new_with_mnemonic() or gtk_label_set_text_with_mnemonic().
trans-unit.target: 标签中可能包含“助记符”。助记符是标签中带下划线的字符，用于键盘导航。助记符是通过在函数 gtk_label_new_with_mnemonic() 或 gtk_label_set_text_with_mnemonic() 的助记符（例如 "_File" 前加一个下划线的字符串来创建的。

trans-unit.source: Layout managers are delegate classes that handle the preferred size and the allocation of a container widget.

trans-unit.source: Layouting widgets that accept focus on cells should implement the GtkWidgetClass.focus() virtual method. The layouting widget is always responsible for knowing where GtkTreeModel rows are rendered inside the widget, so at GtkWidgetClass.focus() time the layouting widget should use the GtkCellArea methods to navigate focus inside the area and then observe the GtkDirectionType to pass the focus to adjacent rows and areas.
trans-unit.target: 接受单元格焦点的布局小部件应实现 GtkWidgetClass.focus() 虚拟方法。布局小部件始终负责了解小部件内GtkTreeModel行的位置，因此在 GtkWidgetClass.focus() 时，布局小部件应使用GtkCellArea方法导航区域内的焦点，然后观察GtkDirectionType将焦点传递给相邻区域行和区域。

trans-unit.source: Like gtk_builder_value_from_string(), this function demarshals a value from a string, but takes a GType instead of GParamSpec. This function calls g_value_init() on the value argument, so it need not be initialised beforehand.

trans-unit.source: Like gtk_text_buffer_insert(), but the insertion will not occur if iter is at a non-editable location in the buffer. Usually you want to prevent insertions at ineditable locations if the insertion results from a user action (is interactive).
trans-unit.target: 类似于 gtk_text_buffer_insert() ，但是如果 iter 位于缓冲区中的不可编辑位置，则不会发生插入。通常，如果插入是由于用户操作（交互式）而导致的，通常希望防止在不可编辑的位置插入。

trans-unit.source: Like gtk_text_iter_forward_cursor_position(), but moves backward.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 gtk_text_iter_forward_cursor_position() ，但向后移动。

trans-unit.source: Like gtk_text_iter_get_slice(), but invisible text is not included. Invisible text is usually invisible because a GtkTextTag with the “invisible” attribute turned on has been applied to it.
trans-unit.target: 像 gtk_text_iter_get_slice() 一样，但是不包括不可见的文本。不可见的文本通常是不可见的，因为已将启用了“不可见”属性的GtkTextTag应用于它。

trans-unit.source: Like gtk_text_iter_get_text(), but invisible text is not included. Invisible text is usually invisible because a GtkTextTag with the “invisible” attribute turned on has been applied to it.
trans-unit.target: 像 gtk_text_iter_get_text() 一样，但是不包括不可见的文本。不可见的文本通常是不可见的，因为已将启用了“不可见”属性的GtkTextTag应用于它。

trans-unit.source: Like gtk_text_iter_set_line_index(), but the index is in visible bytes, i.e. text with a tag making it invisible is not counted in the index.
trans-unit.target: 像 gtk_text_iter_set_line_index() 一样，但是索引以可见字节为单位，即带有标签使其变为不可见的文本不计入索引。

trans-unit.source: Like gtk_text_iter_set_line_offset(), but the offset is in visible characters, i.e. text with a tag making it invisible is not counted in the offset.
trans-unit.target: 像 gtk_text_iter_set_line_offset() 一样，但偏移量以可见字符表示，即，带有标记使其不可见的文本不计入偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Like all GUI toolkits, GTK uses an event-driven programming model. When the user is doing nothing, GTK sits in the “main loop” and waits for input. If the user performs some action - say, a mouse click - then the main loop “wakes up” and delivers an event to GTK. GTK forwards the event to one or more widgets.
trans-unit.target: 像所有GUI工具包一样，GTK使用事件驱动的编程模型。当用户什么都不做时，GTK会坐在“主循环”中并等待输入。如果用户执行某些操作（例如，单击鼠标），则主循环“醒来”并将事件传递给GTK。GTK将事件转发到一个或多个窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: Like tags, marks can be either named or anonymous. There are two marks built-in to GtkTextBuffer; these are named “insert” and “selection_bound” and refer to the insertion point and the boundary of the selection which is not the insertion point, respectively. If no text is selected, these two marks will be in the same position. You can manipulate what is selected and where the cursor appears by moving these marks around.
trans-unit.target: 像标签一样，标记可以命名也可以匿名使用。GtkTextBuffer内置了两个标记；它们分别称为“插入”和“ selection_bound”，分别指代插入点和非插入点的选择边界。如果未选择任何文本，则这两个标记将位于同一位置。您可以通过移动这些标记来操纵所选内容以及光标出现的位置。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, with the vertical orientation, the widgets will be arranged from top to bottom, starting a new column to the right when necessary. Reducing the height will require more columns, so a larger width will be requested.
trans-unit.target: 同样,在垂直方向上,小部件将从上到下排列,必要时从右边开始新的一列。降低高度将需要更多的列,所以会要求更大的宽度。
